card.property: Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sea Gate may have fallen, but we still stand. We still fight." —Gideon Jura

card.name: Siegecraft

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They thought their fortress impregnable . . . until we marched up with ours, and blocked out the sun." —Golran, dragonscale captain

card.name: Silverchase Fox
card.property: {1} {W}, Sacrifice Silverchase Fox: Exile target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be careful in your hunt. The clever little creature can steal your wards and lead you right into the werewolf's den." —Britta, midwife of Gatstaf

card.name: Skyhunter Skirmisher

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Like dawn's first light, blind the unprepared and banish the shadows." —Skyhunter creed

card.name: Skymarcher Aspirant
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Skymarcher Aspirant has flying as long as you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Skyspear Cavalry
card.property: Flying Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pray her spear reaches you first. Her griffin is less kind.

card.name: Slash of Talons
card.property: Slash of Talons deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The amber sun smokes with fury, gazing on foes that gather like ants invading our home. We are ready! Blade and claw strike as one." —Huatli

card.name: Snubhorn Sentry
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Snubhorn Sentry gets +3/+0 as long as you have the city's blessing.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They're fun to train—if you like stubborn, aggressive, and fiercely territorial.

card.name: Soulmender
card.property: {T}: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Healing is more art than magic. Well, there is still quite a bit of magic."

card.name: Soul Parry
card.property: Prevent all damage one or two target creatures would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was called to this world of steel, and it will be my steel that answers." —Elspeth

card.name: Soul-Strike Technique

card.name: Soul Summons
card.property: Manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ugin's magic reaches beyond the dragons. The clans have adapted it for war.

card.name: Soul Warden
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One does not question the size or shape of the grains of sand in an hourglass. Nor do I question the temperament of the souls under my guidance."

card.name: Sparring Mummy
card.property: When Sparring Mummy enters the battlefield, untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Aspiring to earn their place in the afterlife, acolytes train every day against those who fell short of that glory.

card.name: Spectral Gateguards
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Spectral Gateguards is paired with another creature, both creatures have vigilance.

card.name: Stalwart Aven
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

card.name: Star-Crowned Stag
card.property: Whenever Star-Crowned Stag attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: White as starlight on snow, it appears only on the eve of the winter solstice.

card.name: Stave Off

card.name: Steadfast Sentinel
card.property: Vigilance Eternalize {4}{W}{W} ({4}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Cleric with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Stone Haven Medic
card.property: {W}, {T}: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These days, soldiers never stick around long enough for a proper healing. They just want me to knit them up so they can hurry back to the fight."

card.name: Sunlance
card.property: Sunlance deals 3 damage to target nonwhite creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's easy for the innocent to speak of justice. They seldom feel its terrible power." —Orim, Samite inquisitor

card.name: Suppression Bonds
card.property: Enchant nonland permanent Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A master of hieromancy can see the advantage in any scenario."—Warden Hixus, to Kytheon

card.name: Survive the Night

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The longest nights are measured not in hours, but in heartbeats.

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

card.name: Take Vengeance
card.property: Destroy target tapped creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your death will be a balm, your passing a welcome revision, and all will sigh with peace to know of your demise."

card.name: Tandem Tactics
card.property: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In times of infestation and war, Zendikar favors the blades that strike in unison.

card.name: Teferi's Protection
card.property: Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.) Exile Teferi's Protection.

card.name: Terashi's Grasp
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The jeweler, the potter, the smith . . . They all imbue a bit of their souls into their creations. The kami destroy that crafted mortal shell and absorb the soul within." —Noboru, master kitemaker

card.name: Territorial Hammerskull
card.property: Whenever Territorial Hammerskull attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the eyes up, it's solid bone and stubbornness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the points of our lances lead the way."

card.name: Thraben Inspector
card.property: When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you've been at this as long as I have, nothing can surprise you. That's the hope, at least."

card.name: Thraben Standard Bearer
card.property: {1} {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The uncorrupted rallied under Thalia's leadership and Sigarda's banner.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The gods are not always kind, but they do have a soft spot for plucky underdogs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My scars are my sigils. I will wear them with pride long after you're gone."

card.name: Unwavering Initiate

card.name: Veteran Swordsmith
card.property: Other Soldier creatures you control get +1/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Truth is a straight, keen edge. There are no soft angles or rounded edges. To fight for truth, we must forge in steel."

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her horn is heard across Innistrad, lifting the hearts of the righteous.

card.property: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.) Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor

property.value: "I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi." —Expedition journal entry

property.value: "Learn from your enemies, but do not tolerate them."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Houses always hope for peace, but we always pack for war." —Gvar Barzeel, krumar commander

property.value: "Let no child be without a sword. We will all fight, for if we fail, we will certainly all die." —Oracle en-Vec

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cower, fiend. The night is yours no longer."

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Divining the future is easy when you hold the power to sway it.

property.value: "Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some fates you can see coming for you, plain as day, and there's nothing you can do about them." —Callaphe the mariner

card.property: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Teferi snapped his fingers, and the viashino started clucking like a chicken. Silly, yes, but exactly the thing we needed to break the stifling tension." —Jhoira, master artificer

card.property: Choose one — • Counter target red spell. • Destroy target red permanent.

property.value: Kongming and Lu Su tricked Wei troops into shooting over 100,000 arrows at them to later use against the Wei at Red Cliffs.

property.value: There are more sights on Zendikar than the eyes can see.

property.value: Water calls to water, and the world is left exhausted and withered in its wake.

card.property: {1} {U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.value: "Some merfolk choose to rest their fins in the water. I believe wisdom exists not only where we were born but where we were told not to go."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Bant, a sigil is both a prize of honor and a bond of duty. The one who bears it may be called to fulfill that charge at any moment.

card.property: Counter target spell.

property.value: "Even the greatest inferno begins as a spark. And anyone can snuff out a spark." —Chanyi, mistfire sage

card.property: Draw two cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor

property.value: "All I ask is complete obedience."—Nicol Bolas

card.name: Curiosity
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All Mirri wanted to do was rest, but she couldn't ignore a nagging suspicion as she followed Crovax's skulking form.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Step right up! Try your hand! It'll thrill the senses and boggle the mind!"

card.name: Daze
card.property: You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Dazzling Lights
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on the top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Decision Paralysis
card.property: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Eyes see only what is possible. A trained mind can explore the impossible." —Kefnet, god of knowledge

card.name: Deep Analysis
card.property: Target player draws two cards. Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No fact escapes me. Why do you think you can?"

card.name: Deep Freeze
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 0/4, has defender, loses all other abilities, and is a blue Wall in addition to its other colors and types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For cryomancers, studying the Ice Age isn't just an academic exercise.

card.name: Deepglow Skate
card.property: When Deepglow Skate enters the battlefield, double the number of each kind of counter on any number of target permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its graceful glide paints the ocean floor with strokes of luminescence.

card.name: Diminish
card.property: Target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everything seems a little less ferocious when it's running from a house cat.

card.name: Dirgur Nemesis
card.property: Defender Megamorph {6}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Dispel
card.property: Counter target instant spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I said we should destroy the Eldrazi. Ugin wanted to return them to stasis. Ugin's arguments were . . . unconvincing."—Jace Beleren

card.name: Displace
card.property: Exile up to two target creatures you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll see you soon, Subjects 25 and 26. I've got a good feeling this time!"

card.name: Distortion Strike
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Divination
card.property: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The stars mark your destiny. May you accept the fate thus divulged."

card.name: Djinn of Wishes
card.property: Flying Djinn of Wishes enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it. {2}{U}{U}, Remove a wish counter from Djinn of Wishes: Reveal the top card of your library. You may play that card without paying its mana cost. If you don't, exile it.

card.name: Doorkeeper
card.property: Defender {2}{U}, {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard, where X is the number of creatures with defender you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One piercing stare usually convinces thieves to go elsewhere.

card.name: Dragon's Eye Savants
card.property: Morph—Reveal a blue card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Dragon's Eye Savants is turned face up, look at target opponent's hand.

card.name: Drag Under
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some took to their boats to escape the unfolding nightmare. The remains of their vessels now litter the shores of Nephalia.

card.name: Dreadwaters
card.property: Target player puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard, where X is the number of lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stray into the Morkrut and it may rise to claim you.

card.name: Dream Cache
card.property: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand both on top of your library or both on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dreams' riches are easily spent.—Suq'Ata adage

card.name: Dream Twist
card.property: Target player puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard. Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Eel Umbra
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Embodiment of Spring
card.property: {1} {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Embodiment of Spring: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Arel dreamed of winter's end. The next morning she followed a strange trail and found a seedling in the snow.

card.name: Energy Field
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you by sources you don't control. When a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, sacrifice Energy Field.

card.name: Enlightened Maniac
card.property: When Enlightened Maniac enters the battlefield, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At last! Proof that it's not all in my head!"

card.name: Ensoul Artifact
card.property: Enchant artifact Enchanted artifact is a creature with base power and toughness 5/5 in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Too often, some self-described genius comes up with a "labor-saving device" that ends up creating far more work.

card.name: Errant Ephemeron
card.property: Flying Suspend 4—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

card.name: Essence Scatter
card.property: Counter target creature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dependence on luck is anathema to Kefnet's rigorous studies. Those who hope to escape his maze by chance never succeed.

card.name: Everdream
card.property: Draw a card. Splice onto instant or sorcery {2}{U} (As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Exclude
card.property: Counter target creature spell. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't have time for you right now."—Teferi

card.name: Expropriate
card.property: Council's dilemma — Starting with you, each player votes for time or money. For each time vote, take an extra turn after this one. For each money vote, choose a permanent owned by the voter and gain control of it. Exile Expropriate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few things are more valuable than time or money—and Leovold has plenty of both.

card.name: Fact or Fiction
card.property: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Try to pretend like you understand what's important."

card.name: Faerie Invaders
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Small enough to penetrate the narrowest crack in a castle wall and numerous enough to hack apart a griffin.

card.name: Faerie Mechanist
card.property: Flying When Faerie Mechanist enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Failed Inspection
card.property: Counter target spell. Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most dangerous thing an artificer can do is believe an invention is perfect.

card.name: Fascination
card.property: Choose one — • Each player draws X cards. • Each player puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard.

card.name: Fathom Seer
card.property: Morph—Return two Islands you control to their owner's hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Fathom Seer is turned face up, draw two cards.

card.name: Fblthp, the Lost
card.property: When Fblthp, the Lost enters the battlefield, draw a card. If it entered from your library or was cast from your library, draw two cards instead. When Fblthp becomes the target of a spell, shuffle Fblthp into its owner's library.

card.name: Flashfreeze
card.property: Counter target red or green spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your downfall was not your ignorance, your weakness, or your hubris, but your warm blood." —Heidar, Rimewind master

card.name: Fledgling Mawcor
card.property: Flying {T}: Fledgling Mawcor deals 1 damage to any target. Morph {U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Fleeting Distraction
card.property: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first spell taught to young mages, it has spared the lives of many whose hands are too small to hold a sword.

card.name: Floodgate
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Floodgate has flying, sacrifice it. When Floodgate leaves the battlefield, it deals damage equal to half the number of Islands you control, rounded down, to each nonblue creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Quick, Rhirhok—teach me to swim!" —Makht, goblin casualty

card.name: Fog Bank
card.property: Defender, flying Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Fog Bank.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The union of sea and sky makes a perfect cover." —Talrand, sky summoner

card.name: Fogwalker
card.property: Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.) When Fogwalker enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Foil
card.property: You may discard an Island card and another card rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Among wizards, poor timing is the most consistent mistake.

card.name: Forbidden Alchemy
card.property: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Frantic Search
card.property: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Untap up to three lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It took the banning of temporal manipulation at Tolaria West to teach its students the value of time.

card.name: Frilled Sea Serpent

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Reel it in. No, wait! Throw it back!"—Gertrude, deep-sea angler

card.name: Frost Lynx
card.property: When Frost Lynx enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It readily attacks much larger prey, knowing retaliation is impossible.

card.name: Gaseous Form
card.property: Enchant creature Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's hard to hurt anyone when you're as transparent as your motives." —Ertai, wizard adept

card.name: Ghost Ship
card.property: Flying {U}{U}{U}: Regenerate Ghost Ship.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Going down with the ship is just the beginning.

card.name: Glacial Crasher
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Glacial Crasher can't attack unless there is a Mountain on the battlefield.

card.name: Glint
card.property: Target creature you control gets +0/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakshasa waste no opportunity to display their wealth and power, even in the midst of a sorcerous duel.

card.name: Gone Missing
card.property: Put target permanent on top of its owner's library. Investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes it's best for the lost to stay lost." —Herzag, mayor of Havengul

card.name: Grasp of Phantoms
card.property: Put target creature on top of its owner's library. Flashback {7}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Guard Gomazoa
card.property: Defender, flying Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Guard Gomazoa.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It lingers near the outposts of the Makindi Trenches, inadvertently granting another layer of defense.

card.name: Gurmag Drowner
card.property: Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.) When Gurmag Drowner exploits a creature, look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Gush
card.property: You may return two Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't trust your secrets to the sea.

card.name: Hedron Crab
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hedrons perplex minds both great and small.

card.name: Hieroglyphic Illumination
card.property: Draw two cards. Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The answers are here. This is the way through the trial."

card.name: Hightide Hermit
card.property: Defender When Hightide Hermit enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters). Pay {E}{E}: Hightide Hermit can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Hinterland Drake
card.property: Flying Hinterland Drake can't block artifact creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As a kid, I dreamed of flying on those wild drakes. They inspired me to build wings of my own." —Nadja Cloudtoucher, aerowright

card.name: Horseshoe Crab
card.property: {U}: Untap Horseshoe Crab.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the final days before the disaster, all the crabs on Tolaria migrated from inlets, streams, and ponds back to the sea. No one took note.

card.name: Humongulus
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Searching the city for Fblthp felt like sifting the rain for a single drop of blood.

card.name: Impulse
card.property: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You call it luck. I call it preparation."

card.name: Inkfathom Divers
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) When Inkfathom Divers enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

card.name: Invisibility
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Verick held his breath. Breathing wouldn't reveal his position, but it would force him to smell the goblins.

card.name: Ior Ruin Expedition
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Ior Ruin Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Ior Ruin Expedition and sacrifice it: Draw two cards.

card.name: Jace's Phantasm
card.property: Flying Jace's Phantasm gets +4/+4 as long as an opponent has ten or more cards in their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the abstract memories of the Iquati, Jace found interesting ideas to improve upon.

card.name: Jeering Homunculus
card.property: When Jeering Homunculus enters the battlefield, you may goad target creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mklthd had always hated crowds . . . and they had always hated him.

card.name: Jeskai Sage
card.property: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Jeskai Sage dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The one who conquers the mind is greater than the one who conquers the world."

card.name: Jushi Apprentice
card.property: {2} {U}, {T}: Draw a card. If you have nine or more cards in hand, flip Jushi Apprentice.

alternate.name: Tomoya the Revealer

card.name: Jwar Isle Avenger
card.property: Surge {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its surge cost if you or a teammate has cast another spell this turn.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though solitary by nature, the sphinxes did not hesitate to join in the fight against the Eldrazi.

card.name: Kiora's Dambreaker
card.property: When Kiora's Dambreaker enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When your enemy flees, send the sea to pursue them."—Kiora

card.name: Laboratory Brute
card.property: When Laboratory Brute enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It keeps intruders out and experiments in.

card.name: Laboratory Maniac
card.property: If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His mind whirled with grand plans, never thinking of what might happen if he were to succeed.

card.name: Labyrinth Guardian
card.property: When Labyrinth Guardian becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it. Embalm {3}{U} ({3}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a white Zombie Illusion Warrior with no mana cost. Embalm only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Lay Claim
card.property: Enchant permanent You control enchanted permanent. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Initiates need worry only about the trials. Everything else is in the hands of the gods.

card.name: Leapfrog
card.property: Leapfrog has flying as long as you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Most compete for insects at street level. Some dwell near Izzet laboratories and ride the thermal updrafts."—Yolov, Simic bioengineer.

card.name: Mahamoti Djinn
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

card.name: Mana Leak
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

card.name: Man-o'-War
card.property: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch."—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

card.name: Master Transmuter
card.property: {U}, {T}, Return an artifact you control to its owner's hand: You may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wasted potential surrounds us. Lend me that bauble, and let me see what it can be made to be."

card.name: Maximize Altitude
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

card.name: Memory Erosion
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Filigree Texts do not compel you to act in accordance with their precepts. They only specify the consequences should you fail."—Lodus of the Ethersworn

card.name: Memory Lapse
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What a lonely agony, the memory of memories lost.

card.name: Merfolk Looter
card.property: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.

card.name: Messenger Jays
card.property: Flying Council's dilemma — When Messenger Jays enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for feather or quill. Put a +1/+1 counter on Messenger Jays for each feather vote and draw a card for each quill vote. For each card drawn this way, discard a card.

card.name: Metallic Rebuke
card.property: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Too little, too late. The machine is in motion." —Tezzeret

card.name: Mind Sculpt
card.property: Target opponent puts the top seven cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your mind was a curious mix of madness and genius. I just took away the genius." —Jace Beleren

card.name: Mind Spring
card.property: Draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fragments of thought refract and multiply, surging in a geyser of dizzying insight.

card.name: The Mirari Conjecture
card.property: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Return target instant card from your graveyard to your hand. II — Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. III — Until end of turn, whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Misdirection
card.property: You may exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Change the target of target spell with a single target.

card.name: Mistform Shrieker
card.property: Flying {1}: Mistform Shrieker becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn. Morph {3}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Mist Raven
card.property: Flying When Mist Raven enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you see a raven, head for the hills. It knows when the ghost-tide is headed in." —Sved, fisherman of Nephalia

card.name: Mnemonic Wall
card.property: Defender When Mnemonic Wall enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It augments anamnesis. What is so confusing about that?" —Perisophia the philosopher

card.name: Monastery Loremaster
card.property: Megamorph {5}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.) When Monastery Loremaster is turned face up, return target noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Mulldrifter
card.property: Flying When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards. Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Murder of Crows
card.property: Flying Whenever another creature dies, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even more than carrion, they crave the last words of the dying.

card.name: Mystical Teachings
card.property: Search your library for an instant card or a card with flash, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Flashback {5}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Mystic Confluence
card.property: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. • Return target creature to its owner's hand. • Draw a card.

card.name: Mystic of the Hidden Way
card.property: Mystic of the Hidden Way can't be blocked. Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are no obstacles, only different paths."

card.name: Nagging Thoughts
card.property: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard. Madness {1}{U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Negate
card.property: Counter target noncreature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As one, nature lifts its voice to tell you this: 'No.'"

card.name: Niblis of Dusk
card.property: Flying Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It fuels its lanterns by leaching the warmth from its surroundings.

card.name: Nine-Tail White Fox
card.property: Whenever Nine-Tail White Fox deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has waited a millennium just for you, and for a millennium will it watch over your descendants.

card.name: Ninja of the Deep Hours
card.property: Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever Ninja of the Deep Hours deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

card.name: Ojutai Interceptor
card.property: Flying Megamorph {3}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Though I may soar, I could never fly as high as the dragons."

card.name: Ojutai's Breath
card.property: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Omenspeaker
card.property: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.

card.name: Opportunity
card.property: Target player draws four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Opportunity isn't something you wait for. It's something you create."

card.name: Opt
card.property: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The crystal pulsed with the power of Teferi's planeswalker spark. Had Jhoira given him a blessing or a curse?

card.name: Peel from Reality
card.property: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Soulless demon, you are bound to me. Now we will both dwell in oblivion."

card.name: Phantasmal Bear
card.property: When Phantasmal Bear becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know it to be false, but when its claws find you, what you know won't matter much at all." —Pol Jamaar, illusionist

card.name: Phantasmal Dragon
card.property: Flying When Phantasmal Dragon becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its hunger and ire are no less for being wrought of lies and mist.

card.name: Phyrexian Ingester
card.property: Imprint — When Phyrexian Ingester enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature. Phyrexian Ingester gets +X/+Y, where X is the exiled creature card's power and Y is its toughness.

card.name: Phyrexian Metamorph
card.property: ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.) You may have Phyrexian Metamorph enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact or creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: Pondering Mage
card.property: When Pondering Mage enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library. Draw a card.

card.name: Portent
card.property: Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order. You may have that player shuffle their library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Predict
card.property: Choose a card name, then target player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard. If that card has the chosen name, you draw two cards. Otherwise, you draw a card.

card.name: Preordain
card.property: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
card.property: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can't learn to enjoy life's amusements in the pages of books. You must seek them out in earnest."

card.name: Propaganda
card.property: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The cost of your opposition will be extracted from your wits." —Nekusar, the Mindrazer

card.name: Prosperous Pirates
card.property: When Prosperous Pirates enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The floating city of High and Dry hasn't yet sunk under the weight of gold, but it's not for want of trying.

card.name: Purple-Crystal Crab
card.property: When Purple-Crystal Crab dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A precious shell without, a delicious taste within.

card.name: Refocus
card.property: Untap target creature. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before you can open your third eye, you must prove you can open the first two."

card.name: Repulse
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Retraction Helix
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gains "{T}: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where the geometries of the world collapse, a master of the aether can harvest power beyond comprehending.

card.name: Rhystic Study
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Friends teach what you want to know. Enemies teach what you need to know.

card.name: Riftwing Cloudskate
card.property: Flying When Riftwing Cloudskate enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand. Suspend 3—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The owls learn of mana from the mages who know it best.

card.name: Rishadan Footpad
card.property: When Rishadan Footpad enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent unless they pay {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best things in life are free. Money, for instance."

card.name: River Darter
card.property: River Darter can't be blocked by Dinosaurs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though the Luxa River brings life to Naktamun, it's not without dangers.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Adepts of the Riverwheel Stronghold can run through rain and never get wet; masters use the raindrops as stepping stones.

card.name: Sage of Lat-Nam
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though it was laid to waste by the brothers, many schools of magic trace their origins to the College of Lat-Nam, including the first Tolarian Academy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rising tide of Orazca's plunder lifted all ships.

card.name: Sapphire Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Target player draws a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. • Target creature gains flying until end of turn. • Target creature an opponent controls phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)

card.name: Scroll Thief
card.property: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.value: Kapsho merfolk have infiltrated fortresses as remote as the desert citadel in Sunari in their relentless quest for arcane knowledge.

card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Draw two cards. If you have the city's blessing, draw three cards instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stolen knowledge can never be stolen back.

card.name: Send to Sleep
card.property: Tap up to two target creatures. Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.

card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, Serendib Efreet deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Summoners of efreeti remember only the power of command, never the sting of regret.

card.name: Shimmerscale Drake
card.property: Flying Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are drawn by the brilliant blue glint of the mineral lazotep from the mines below.

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Silent Observer
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Skitter Eel
card.property: {2} {U}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life has no mistakes, only experiments."—Yolov, Simic bioengineer

card.name: Skittering Crustacean
Sleep

card.property: Slither Blade can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some naga initiates move as silently as the suns' reflections on the water.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vizier's wisdom proved invaluable in untangling the Mercadian knot of lies.

property.name: Flavor

card.property: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

As long as Tandem Lookout is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, draw a card."

card.name: Teferi, Temporal Archmage
card.property: +1: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library. −1: Untap up to four target permanents. −10: You get an emblem with "You may activate loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant." Teferi, Temporal Archmage can be your commander.

card.property: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

property.name: Flavor

card.property: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard. Draw a card.

card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whatever Yawgmoth marks, dies. There is no escape." —Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

card.name: Bala Ged Scorpion
card.property: When Bala Ged Scorpion enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with power 1 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fast and lethal, with a penchant for the weak and infirm.

card.name: Baleful Ammit
card.property: Lifelink When Baleful Ammit enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not all in our crop deserve the afterlife. We must leave the unworthy behind, Samut." —Djeru, initiate of Tah crop

card.name: Balustrade Spy
card.property: Flying When Balustrade Spy enters the battlefield, target player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

card.name: Bartizan Bats
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bats are welcome to eat thousands of my pets. I have multitudes more that will ultimately eat the bats."—Izoni

card.name: Bitter Revelation
card.property: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here you lie then, Ugin. The corpses of worlds will join you in the tomb." —Sorin Markov

card.name: Black Cat
card.property: When Black Cat dies, target opponent discards a card at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its last life is spent tormenting your dreams.

card.name: Black Knight
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)

card.name: Black Market
card.property: Whenever a creature dies, put a charge counter on Black Market. At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {B} for each charge counter on Black Market.

card.name: Bladebrand
card.property: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One knife, two knives, three knives, four—which will drop you to the floor?"

card.name: Blessing of Belzenlok
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn. If it's legendary, it also gains lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My heart is not mine, it is Belzenlok's. All hearts are his, and all blood." —"Rite of Belzenlok"

card.name: Blighted Bat
card.property: Flying {1}: Blighted Bat gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Amonkhet's dual suns don't allow for the darkness of night, so bats are most active under the gloom of the frequent sandstorms.

card.name: Blightsoil Druid
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "See the beauty in death: the clean white bones lying in the fertile soil and the brightly colored moonglove sprouting from the fell earth."

card.name: Blistergrub
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) When Blistergrub dies, each opponent loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avoid anything that scuttles, scrabbles, or shambles." —Opar, veteran guide

card.name: Blood Artist
card.property: Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Great art can never be created without great suffering."

card.name: Bloodrite Invoker
card.property: {8}: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The brood lineages unfolded across the world, each patterned after one of three progenitors, each a study in mindless consumption." —The Invokers' Tales

card.name: Bone Splinters
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will make your bones into a weapon that will lay even the mighty low."—Modriss of Zargoth Fen

card.name: Boon of Emrakul
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/-3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All around Emrakul, life re-formed in her image.

card.name: Breeding Pit
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Breeding Pit unless you pay {B}{B}. At the beginning of your end step, create a 0/1 black Thrull creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The thrulls bred at a terrifying pace. In the end, they overwhelmed the Order of the Ebon Hand.

card.name: Butcher's Glee
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn. Regenerate it. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Crave made Kneecleaver think she was bigger than the dragon.

card.name: Cabal Therapy
card.property: Choose a nonland card name. Target player reveals their hand and discards all cards with that name. Flashback—Sacrifice a creature. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Cackling Imp
card.property: Flying {T}: Target player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its laughter drives needles through your mind.

card.name: Cadaver Imp
card.property: Flying When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.

card.name: Cairn Wanderer
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) As long as a creature card with flying is in a graveyard, Cairn Wanderer has flying. The same is true for fear, first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, landwalk, lifelink, protection, reach, trample, shroud, and vigilance.

card.name: Caligo Skin-Witch
card.property: Kicker {3}{B} (You may pay an additional {3}{B} as you cast this spell.) When Caligo Skin-Witch enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, each opponent discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take their faces. The lips of these unbelievers may yet honor the Demonlord."

card.name: Carrion Feeder
card.property: Carrion Feeder can't block. Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has no respect for the deeds of martyrs, reducing their legacy to a mouthful of flesh.

card.name: Carrion Imp
card.property: Flying When Carrion Imp enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No scrap of nutrition goes to waste in the undercity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am sewer-king!" said Rat. "I am quick and cunning and I know every tunnel.""No, I am king!" said Zombie. "I am cold and deadly and no rot can harm me."Then Croc came and ate them both.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The entire murder scene was covered in dripping, oozing slime. No need for a soothsayer to solve that one."—Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

card.name: Caustic Tar
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target player loses 3 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spite of the Cabal turns meadow into mire.

card.name: Certain Death
card.property: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some spirits cling to one person, feasting on the growing fear until a final moment of all-consuming terror.

card.name: Child of Night
card.property: Lifelink

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

card.name: Coat with Venom
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+2 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every Silumgar blade carries the blessing of our dragonlord." —Xathi the Infallible

card.name: Collective Brutality
card.property: Escalate—Discard a card. (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.) Choose one or more — • Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it. That player discards that card. • Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. • Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Corpsehatch
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. Create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

card.name: Costly Plunder
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No lock of iron is a match for Vraska's will of stone.

card.name: Covenant of Blood
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Covenant of Blood deals 4 damage to any target and you gain 4 life.

card.name: Cower in Fear
card.property: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You will fully understand fear when you discover it is the final thing you put your faith in." —Nicol Bolas

card.name: Crippling Blight
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Still alive? No matter. I'll leave you as a warning to others who would oppose me." —Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter

card.name: Crow of Dark Tidings
card.property: Flying When Crow of Dark Tidings enters the battlefield or dies, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

card.name: Cursed Minotaur
card.property: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look! That is why we must never waver. That is what awaits us if we fail." —Djeru, initiate of Tah crop

card.name: Daring Demolition
card.property: Destroy target creature or Vehicle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Living so close to death gives the aetherborn an unusual perspective on risk.

card.name: Darkblast
card.property: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Dark Dabbling
card.property: Regenerate target creature. Draw a card. (The next time the creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.) Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, also regenerate each other creature you control.

card.name: Dark Ritual
card.property: Add {B}{B}{B}.

card.name: Dark Withering
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. Madness {B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Dauthi Mindripper
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Whenever Dauthi Mindripper attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, defending player discards three cards.

card.name: Deadbridge Shaman
card.property: When Deadbridge Shaman dies, target opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ending her life won't end the infestation.

card.name: Deadeye Tormentor
card.property: Raid — When Deadeye Tormentor enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, target opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Despite their noble heritage, the pirates of the Deadeye Fleet are known for underhanded tactics and despicable trickery.

card.name: Deadly Tempest
card.property: Destroy all creatures. Each player loses life equal to the number of creatures they controlled that were destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the winds blow out of the abyss, death is the only harvest.

card.name: Dead Reveler
card.property: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He's the unlife of the party.

card.name: Death Denied
card.property: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Takenuma was filled with a chorus of moans, shrieks, and wails. Some came from the living, some from the dying, and some, most horribly, from the dead.

card.name: Defeat
card.property: Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wars are decided one life at a time." —Gvar Barzeel, Kolaghan warrior

card.name: Demonic Tutor
card.property: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana learned the secrets she sought, but at a price that was etched on her fate.

card.name: Demonic Vigor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the Cabal, death is just another mark of devotion.

card.name: Demon's Grasp
card.property: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take what solace you can in the knowledge that you will not be here to witness Zendikar's demise."—Ob Nixilis

card.name: Desperate Castaways
card.property: Desperate Castaways can't attack unless you control an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A pirate crew without a ship is a crew that will do anything to get one.

card.name: Diabolic Edict
card.property: Target player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Dictate of Erebos
card.property: Flash Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I take no pleasure in your suffering, but it is necessary. Once you accept your fate you'll find eternity more tolerable."

card.name: Die Young
card.property: Choose target creature. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters), then you may pay any amount of {E}. The creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each {E} paid this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the time comes, let go. Nothing lasts forever."

card.name: Dinosaur Hunter
card.property: Whenever Dinosaur Hunter deals damage to a Dinosaur, destroy that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Aye, the foul beast chomped me, but I got away. You'd best believe when I find it again, it won't get away so easy."

card.name: Dirge of Dread
card.property: All creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Dirge of Dread, you may have target creature gain fear until end of turn.

card.name: Dismember
card.property: ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You serve Phyrexia. Your pieces would better serve Phyrexia elsewhere."—Azax-Azog, the Demon Thane

card.name: Disowned Ancestor
card.property: Outlast {1}{B} ({1}{B}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Long after death, the spirits of the Disowned continue to seek redemption among their Abzan kin.

card.name: Doomed Dissenter
card.property: When Doomed Dissenter dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is only one fate left to those banished from the God-Pharaoh's city.

card.name: Douse in Gloom
card.property: Douse in Gloom deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Mardu warrior was overjoyed when Tasigur set him free and granted him passage through the jungle. He failed to notice the Sultai leader's cruel smile.

card.name: Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief
card.property: Flying {X}{B}{B}: Target creature gets -0/-X until end of turn and Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If our former masters would have us kneel again, they shall feel our defiance slashed across their membranes."

card.name: Dreadbringer Lampads
card.property: Constellation — Whenever Dreadbringer Lampads or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

card.name: Dread Drone
card.property: When Dread Drone enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each Eldrazi ancient spawned a lineage of horrors in unfathomable shapes.

card.name: Dread Return
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flashback—Sacrifice three creatures. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The will to return can overpower the will to survive.

card.name: Dregscape Zombie
card.property: Unearth {B} ({B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undead of Grixis are fueled by their hatred of the living.

card.name: Driver of the Dead
card.property: When Driver of the Dead dies, return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some vampires resorted to corpse trading after cathars burned their estates and drove them from their ancestral feeding grounds.

card.name: Drudge Sentinel
card.property: {3}: Tap Drudge Sentinel. It gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Cabal assured the Seven Houses that hostages receive all the food and rest they require.

card.name: Dukhara Scavenger
card.property: When Dukhara Scavenger enters the battlefield, you may put target artifact or creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scouring sands of Shefet polish its carapace, and the ranks of the cursed fill its belly.

card.name: Duress
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Dusk Charger
card.property: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Dusk Charger gets +2/+2 as long as you have the city's blessing.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stories say demon blood runs in its veins, making it fearless and bloodthirsty.

card.name: Dusk Legion Zealot
card.property: When Dusk Legion Zealot enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once they reached Orazca, the Legion's explorers ransacked tombs and temples, hunting for the Immortal Sun.

card.name: The Eldest Reborn
card.property: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. II — Each opponent discards a card. III — Put target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Epicure of Blood
card.property: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fleshy, with just a hint of leather. A fine vintage."

card.name: Erg Raiders
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if Erg Raiders didn't attack this turn, Erg Raiders deals 2 damage to you unless it came under your control this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their skills are extensive, and their appetite for battle just as vast.

card.name: Eternal Thirst
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has lifelink and "Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature." (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card.name: Evincar's Justice
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Evincar's Justice deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Executioner's Capsule
card.property: {1} {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Executioner's Capsule: Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is always a moment of trepidation before opening a message capsule, for fear of the judgment that might be contained within.

card.name: Exsanguinate
card.property: Each opponent loses X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vampires don't consider patience a virtue nor gluttony a sin.

card.name: Eyeblight's Ending
card.property: Destroy target non-Elf creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those without beauty are Lorwyn's greatest tumor. The winnowers have an unpleasant duty, but a necessary one." —Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana

card.name: Fallen Angel
card.property: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do you weep for the dead? I rejoice, for they have died for me."

card.name: Farbog Revenant
card.property: Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spiteful geists rise from the muck of the Farbogs, eager to lure travelers to their doom.

card.name: Fatal Push
card.property: Destroy target creature if it has converted mana cost 2 or less. Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has converted mana cost 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Fen Hauler
card.property: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Fen Hauler can't be blocked by artifact creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Success is found where others fear to look." —Ara, renegade smuggler

card.name: Feral Abomination
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Urborg used to be lovely—scenic volcanoes, respectable lich lords. Since the Cabal came with their nightmares and thrulls, it's all gone to the worms." —Mister Lostspoons, Skulltown gossip.

card.name: Festercreep
card.property: Festercreep enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. {1}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Festercreep: All other creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single festercreep isn't alone. It's already an infestation.

card.name: Festering Newt
card.property: When Festering Newt dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn. That creature gets -4/-4 instead if you control a creature named Bogbrew Witch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its back bubbles like a witch's cauldron, and it smells just as vile.

card.name: Fetid Imp
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {B}: Fetid Imp gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Fill with Fright
card.property: Target player discards two cards. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: First-Sphere Gargantua
card.property: When First-Sphere Gargantua enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. Unearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Flesh to Dust
card.property: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Another day. Another avenging angel. Another clump of feathers to toss in the trash." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Fretwork Colony
card.property: Fretwork Colony can't block. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Fretwork Colony and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The swarm leaves behind a flawless pattern that only occasionally threatens the structural integrity of the wood.

card.name: Fungal Infection
card.property: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To thallids, the whole world is just a pile of mulch to grow saprolings in.

card.name: Genju of the Fens
card.property: Enchant Swamp {2}: Until end of turn, enchanted Swamp becomes a 2/2 black Spirit creature with "{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn." It's still a land. When enchanted Swamp is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Fens from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Ghostly Changeling
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) {1}{B}: Ghostly Changeling gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In desolate places, changelings may take the shape of fancies, or memories, or fears.

card.name: Ghoulcaller's Accomplice
card.property: {3} {B}, Exile Ghoulcaller's Accomplice from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once in the box, we're all the same."

card.name: Gifted Aetherborn
card.property: Deathtouch, lifelink

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A few aetherborn have discovered a way to sustain their own existences at the cost of an insatiable hunger for the life essence of other beings.

card.name: Go for the Throat
card.property: Destroy target nonartifact creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Having flesh is increasingly a liability on Mirrodin.

card.name: Gonti, Lord of Luxury
card.property: Deathtouch When Gonti, Lord of Luxury enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of target opponent's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest on the bottom of that library in a random order. You may look at and cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.

card.name: Grasping Scoundrel
card.property: Grasping Scoundrel gets +1/+0 as long as it's attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can hear the plunder calling. It asks for me by name."

card.name: Gravecrawler
card.property: Gravecrawler can't block. You may cast Gravecrawler from your graveyard as long as you control a Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Innistrad's ghoulcallers are talented enough, but let me show you what someone with real power can create." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Gravedigger
card.property: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only a thin layer of dirt separates civilization from an undead apocalypse.

card.name: Gravepurge
card.property: Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lord Silumgar has given you a second chance to please him." —Siara, the Dragon's Mouth

card.name: Grave Titan
card.property: Deathtouch Whenever Grave Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

card.name: Gray Merchant of Asphodel
card.property: When Gray Merchant of Asphodel enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, where X is your devotion to black. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

card.name: Grim Affliction
card.property: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the small wounds let hope bleed out.

card.name: Grim Discovery
card.property: Choose one or both — • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few among the living understand just how much of their world is shaped by the ruins of the dead.

card.name: Grixis Slavedriver
card.property: When Grixis Slavedriver leaves the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Grotesque Mutation
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card.name: Gruesome Fate
card.property: Each opponent loses 1 life for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You were keen enough to sink your fangs into us, vampire! And now you're afraid of a few little nibbles?" —Udvil "Ratty" Ratlock

card.name: Gurmag Angler
card.property: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If everything in the Gurmag Swamp hungers for human flesh, what bait could be more effective?

card.name: Haakon, Stromgald Scourge
