card.property: You may cast Haakon, Stromgald Scourge from your graveyard, but not from anywhere else. As long as Haakon is on the battlefield, you may play Knight cards from your graveyard. When Haakon dies, you lose 2 life.

card.name: Hideous End
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A little dark magic won't stop me. The worse the curse, the better the prize." —Radavi, Joraga relic hunter, last words

card.name: Hired Blade
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you want them dead, buy some poison. If you want them to have the worst day of their life before dying, then let's talk price."

card.name: Hound of the Farbogs
card.property: Delirium — Hound of the Farbogs has menace as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As you hear it baying in the distance, you'll feel its breath on your neck.

card.name: Hunter of Eyeblights
card.property: When Hunter of Eyeblights enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you don't control. {2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with a counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Snokk ran as fast as he could, but the sound of hooves grew ever louder in his ears.

card.name: Hypnotic Specter
card.property: Flying Whenever Hypnotic Specter deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its victims are known by their eyes: shattered vessels leaking broken dreams.

card.name: Induce Despair
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the revealed card's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the angel saw was her doom.

card.name: Infernal Scarring
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "When this creature dies, draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One who is marked by a demon in life is sure to be remembered as one in death.

card.name: Infest
card.property: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is why we don't go out in banewasp weather." —Rannon, Vithian holdout

card.name: Innocent Blood
card.property: Each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.

card.name: Inquisition of Kozilek
card.property: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost 3 or less. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the awakening of the Eldrazi, some vampires took it upon themselves to remind the others where their loyalty should lie.

card.name: Instill Infection
card.property: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The results of our ninth inoculation were the same. The specimen was, of course, euthanized before the contagion could spread." —Vedalken research notes

card.name: Kalastria Nightwatch
card.property: Whenever you gain life, Kalastria Nightwatch gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kalitas may have returned to mindless servitude beneath the Eldrazi, but we say never again."—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

card.name: Krumar Bond-Kin
card.property: Morph {4}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Abzan replaced my savagery with a noble heritage. I would give my life for my House."

card.name: Lawless Broker
card.property: When Lawless Broker dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kaladesh's illicit marketplaces are known as "night markets," but if you know who to ask, you can find what you're looking for at any time of the day.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know I should be more concerned. But a big, blue zombie-potamus from beyond the stars? This is what they're invading us with?"—Mileva, Boros legionnaire

card.name: Lethal Sting
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control. Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Initiates once believed defeat was the worst fate possible—a sentiment they quickly abandoned.

card.name: Liliana, Death's Majesty
card.property: +1: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard. −3: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types. −7: Destroy all non-Zombie creatures.

card.name: Living Death
card.property: Each player exiles all creature cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.

card.name: Lord of the Accursed
card.property: Other Zombies you control get +1/+1. {1}{B}, {T}: All Zombies gain menace until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Curse of Wandering leaves only hatred.

card.name: Macabre Waltz
card.property: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana is never one to follow someone else's lead.

card.name: Marauding Boneslasher
card.property: Marauding Boneslasher can't block unless you control another Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With the Hekma destroyed, the wandering dead that sought entrance to Naktamun had free rein to lay waste to the city.

card.name: March of the Drowned
card.property: Choose one — • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return two target Pirate cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Mark of the Vampire
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My 'condition' is a trial. The weak are consumed by it. The strong transcend it." —Sorin Markov

card.name: Marsh Hulk
card.property: Megamorph {6}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Now vengeance is his sole purpose.

card.name: Mephitic Vapors
card.property: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn. Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on the top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ravnica's safest strongholds are often neither.

card.name: Merciless Resolve
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or land. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You sought to anger me, Nahiri. Soon you will see how well you have succeeded."

card.name: Miasmic Mummy
card.property: When Miasmic Mummy enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its breath doesn't assault the senses. It pollutes the mind.

card.name: Mind Rake
card.property: Target player discards two cards. Overload {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spells of madness often require a sacrifice of sanity.

card.name: Mind Rot
card.property: Target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It saddens me to lose a source of inspiration. This one seemed especially promising." —Ashiok

card.name: Mind Shatter
card.property: Target player discards X cards at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dark thoughts hatch and twist within the mind, straining to take wing.

card.name: Mire's Malice
card.property: Target opponent discards two cards. Awaken 3—{5}{B} (If you cast this spell for {5}{B}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

card.name: Moment of Craving
card.property: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The time of condemnation is at hand. Dusk washes over the world, and I consign you to eternal darkness!"

card.name: Murder
card.property: Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By fate or by will, every reign must come to an end."—Kethis, the Hidden Hand

card.name: Murderous Compulsion
card.property: Destroy target tapped creature. Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thank you. This blade becomes so hot in my hand, but your blood has quenched it."

card.name: Nameless Inversion
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Target creature gets +3/-3 and loses all creature types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as a changeling's influence can have dramatic effects, so too can its sudden withdrawal.

card.name: Nantuko Husk
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Nantuko Husk gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The soul sheds light, and death is its shadow. When the light dims, life and death embrace."—Nantuko teaching

card.name: Never Happened
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's graveyard or hand and exile it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dimir assassins have the precision to slay a single memory.

card.name: Nighthowler
card.property: Bestow {2}{B}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Nighthowler and enchanted creature each get +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

card.name: Night's Whisper
card.property: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen things that would reduce a weaker person to blubbering and raving. Want to hear about them?" —Vraska

card.name: Nirkana Assassin
card.property: Whenever you gain life, Nirkana Assassin gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nirkana assassins craft incurable concoctions by mixing basilisk marrow and deathwillow sap with the vital fluids of a dozen other poisonous species.

card.name: Noxious Dragon
card.property: Flying When Noxious Dragon dies, you may destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragons of Silumgar's brood begin to digest their prey even before consuming it, letting their caustic breath do much of the work.

card.name: Okiba-Gang Shinobi
card.property: Ninjutsu {3}{B} ({3}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever Okiba-Gang Shinobi deals combat damage to a player, that player discards two cards.

card.name: Painful Lesson
card.property: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You wish to remember this lesson? I will write it down for you." —Senifet, vizier of Bontu

card.name: Perish
card.property: Destroy all green creatures. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There will come a time when the voices of soil and seedling will sing only laments." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Pestilence
card.property: At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pestilence. {B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Phyrexian Arena
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A spark of resistance against a tide of corruption.

card.name: Phyrexian Plaguelord
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Plaguelord: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn. Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The final stage of the illness: delirium, convulsions, and death." —Phyrexian progress notes

card.name: Phyrexian Rager
card.property: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I believe many worlds will bow to Phyrexia. Mirrodin is merely the first." —Sheoldred, Whispering One

card.name: Phyrexian Reclamation
card.property: {1} {B}, Pay 2 life: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death is no excuse to stop working.

card.name: Pit Keeper
card.property: When Pit Keeper enters the battlefield, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The undead are not 'awakened.' They are evicted when there is no room left in the pit for more bodies."

card.name: Plaguecrafter
card.property: When Plaguecrafter enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each player who can't discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My power is generosity, in a way. I give my survivors an appreciation for their lives."

card.name: Plagued Rusalka
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look at her, once filled with innocence. Death has a way of wringing away such . . . deficiencies."—Savra

card.name: Plague Wight
card.property: Whenever Plague Wight becomes blocked, each creature blocking it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For some goods, the best couriers are the dead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's rare that the Prakhata Club closes its doors. It's also rare that Lord Gonti meets with Consul Kambal. What are the odds the two would occur on the same day?

card.name: Prowling Pangolin
card.property: When Prowling Pangolin enters the battlefield, any player may sacrifice two creatures. If a player does, sacrifice Prowling Pangolin.

card.name: Queen's Agent
card.property: Lifelink When Queen's Agent enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Quest for the Gravelord
card.property: Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gravelord. Remove three quest counters from Quest for the Gravelord and sacrifice it: Create a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token.

card.name: Rabid Bloodsucker
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Rabid Bloodsucker enters the battlefield, each player loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She haunts the streets, wings spread wide, with carrion on her breath and blood in her eyes.

card.name: Rakdos Drake
card.property: Flying Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakdos rioters paint their faces to resemble the drakes' bloodied muzzles.

card.name: Rakshasa's Secret
card.property: Target opponent discards two cards. Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The voice of a rakshasa is soft, its breath sweet. But every word is the murmur of madness.

card.name: Ravenous Chupacabra
card.property: When Ravenous Chupacabra enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Opening Orazca unleashed more horrors than just the Immortal Sun.

card.name: Read the Bones
card.property: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

card.name: Reaper of Night
card.property: Whenever Reaper of Night attacks, if defending player has two or fewer cards in hand, it gains flying until end of turn.

alternate.name: Harvest Fear
alternate.property: Target opponent discards two cards. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

card.name: Reassembling Skeleton
card.property: {1} {B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They may show up with the wrong thigh bone or mandible, but they always show up."—Zul Ashur, lich lord

card.name: Reckless Imp
card.property: Flying Reckless Imp can't block. Dash {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

card.name: Reckless Spite
card.property: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The end is justified in being mean. Or something like that."

card.name: Recover
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wisdom from the past is best gathered directly from the source."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Confront it at your own peril, for it will confront you for its own amusement.

card.name: Renegade's Getaway
card.property: Target permanent gains indestructible until end of turn. Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy a permanent with indestructible, and if it's a creature, it can't be destroyed by damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You can't fight what you can't find.

card.name: Returned Centaur
card.property: When Returned Centaur enters the battlefield, target player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Driven away by his living kin, he wanders mourning through the wilderness, seeking the dead city of Asphodel.

card.name: Revel in Riches
card.property: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control ten or more Treasures, you win the game.

card.name: Revenant
card.property: Flying Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Born from the slaughter of an entire army, it bears the wrath of a hundred souls.

card.name: Rite of the Serpent
card.property: Destroy target creature. If that creature had a +1/+1 counter on it, create a 1/1 green Snake creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From your death, new life. From your loss, our profit." —Kirada, Qarsi overseer

card.name: Rotfeaster Maggot
card.property: When Rotfeaster Maggot enters the battlefield, exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain life equal to that card's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Is it at the top of the food chain or the bottom?

card.name: Ruin Rat
card.property: Deathtouch When Ruin Rat dies, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From every shadow came the dull scratch of teeth on bones.

card.name: Rune-Scarred Demon
card.property: Flying When Rune-Scarred Demon enters the battlefield, search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The litany of the infernal on his flesh pulses to the beating of his dark heart.

card.name: Sadistic Hypnotist
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Target player discards two cards. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Victory in the pits is almost as rewarding as the methods I use to achieve it."

card.name: Scarab Feast
card.property: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard. Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The face of mediocrity is wrapped in anointed linen. Aspire to a better end." —Epnokep, vizier of Bontu

card.name: Scrounger of Souls
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Yell for help, and that may answer.

card.name: Scuttling Death
card.property: Sacrifice Scuttling Death: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Soulshift 4 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Seal of Doom
card.property: Sacrifice Seal of Doom: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A basilisk's gaze is effective, but disposing of physical remains is a tiresome task. It's far more discreet to dissolve one's victim entirely."—Szadek

card.name: Sengir Vampire
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

card.name: Sewer Nemesis
card.property: As Sewer Nemesis enters the battlefield, choose a player. Sewer Nemesis's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in the chosen player's graveyard. Whenever the chosen player casts a spell, that player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

card.name: Shadowcloak Vampire
card.property: Pay 2 life: Shadowcloak Vampire gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My favorite guilty pleasure? Are there innocent ones?"

card.name: Shambling Attendants
card.property: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the world behold what becomes of those who defy us." —Taigam, Sidisi's Hand

card.name: Shambling Goblin
card.property: When Shambling Goblin dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Kolaghan send them at us. We kill and raise them. They fight the next wave the Kolaghan send. It's a neat little cycle." —Asmala, Silumgar sorcerer

card.name: Shriekmaw
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) When Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Shrouded Lore
card.property: Target opponent chooses a card in your graveyard. You may pay {B}. If you do, repeat this process except that opponent can't choose a card already chosen for Shrouded Lore. Then put the last chosen card into your hand.

card.name: Silumgar Butcher
card.property: Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.) When Silumgar Butcher exploits a creature, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Silumgar takes pride in the diversity of his sibsig.

card.name: Skeletal Scrying
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile X cards from your graveyard. You draw X cards and you lose X life.

card.name: Skeleton Archer
card.property: When Skeleton Archer enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When it comes to killing with precision, a soul is but a hindrance."—Isareth the Awakener

card.name: Skulking Ghost
card.property: Flying When Skulking Ghost becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They exist only so long as the living take no notice." —Kifimbo, Shadow guildmage

card.name: Smiting Helix
card.property: Smiting Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life. Flashback {R}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Malice is appropriate when vengeance is called for.

card.name: Sorin Markov
card.property: +2: Sorin Markov deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life. −3: Target opponent's life total becomes 10. −7: You control target player during that player's next turn.

card.name: Spreading Rot
card.property: Destroy target land. Its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What is this foul presence that defies the sun's cleansing rays?" —Itzama the Crested

card.name: Stab Wound
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 2 life.

card.name: Stallion of Ashmouth
card.property: Delirium — {1}{B}: Stallion of Ashmouth gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Echoing hoofbeats can no longer be assumed to be help from the Gavony Riders.

card.name: Stinkweed Imp
card.property: Flying Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly five cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Street Wraith
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Cycling—Pay 2 life. (Pay 2 life, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lamps on Wyndmoor Street snuff themselves at midnight and refuse to relight, afraid to illuminate what lies in the darkness.

card.name: Stromkirk Patrol
card.property: Whenever Stromkirk Patrol deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You'd best move along, human. Our palates are far less discerning than our master's."

card.name: Subtle Strike
card.property: Choose one or both — • Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Renegades do some of their best work right under the Consulate's nose.

card.name: Sultai Runemark
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Enchanted creature has deathtouch as long as you control a green or blue permanent. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Tar Snare
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The amorphous, magically animated residue known as the Fathom Sludge lurks in the Hagra Cistern, attacking its prey with pseudopods and dragging it down to be digested.

card.name: Tavern Swindler
card.property: {T}, Pay 3 life: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 6 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakdos cultists are her best customers. They never flinch at pain and are seldom good at math.

card.name: Tendrils of Corruption
card.property: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Darkness doesn't always send its minions to do its dirty work.

card.name: Thallid Omnivore
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Thallid Omnivore gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If a Saproling was sacrificed this way, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thelon of Havenwood created thallids as a food source in times of darkness. Thallids did the same with saprolings.

card.name: Thornbow Archer
card.property: Whenever Thornbow Archer attacks, each opponent who doesn't control an Elf loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will not rest until the stench of eyeblights is eradicated from these woods."

card.name: Thorn of the Black Rose
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Thorn of the Black Rose enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If bribery and intimidation fail, Marchesa turns to her favorite form of bureaucracy.

card.name: Thraben Foulbloods
card.property: Delirium — Thraben Foulbloods gets +1/+1 and has menace as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The famed hunting hounds of House Cecani continue to prove the quality of their pedigree.

card.name: Tidy Conclusion
card.property: Destroy target creature. You gain 1 life for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Aetherborn patrons use any means necessary to secure victory for their protégés.

card.name: Torment of Hailfire
card.property: Repeat the following process X times. Each opponent loses 3 life unless that player sacrifices a nonland permanent or discards a card.

card.name: Torment of Venom
card.property: Put three -1/-1 counters on target creature. Its controller loses 3 life unless they sacrifice another nonland permanent or discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Scorpion God's sting sends venom strong enough to poison blood, bone, and spirit.

card.name: Touch of Moonglove
card.property: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. Whenever a creature dealt damage by that creature dies this turn, its controller loses 2 life. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Toxin Sliver
card.property: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It doesn't need to use its venom—it just needs you to know it can.

card.name: Tragic Slip
card.property: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Morbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Linger on death's door and risk being invited in.

card.name: Trespasser's Curse
card.property: Enchant player Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under enchanted player's control, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even in the relative safety of the city, there are places best left undisturbed.

card.name: Trial of Ambition
card.property: When Trial of Ambition enters the battlefield, target opponent sacrifices a creature. When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Ambition to its owner's hand.

card.name: Twins of Maurer Estate
card.property: Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Children, where are your parents?" —Reig, wandering monk, last words

card.name: Typhoid Rats
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kidnappers caught in Havengul are given two choices: languish in prison or become rat catchers. The smart ones go to prison.

card.name: Unburden
card.property: Target player discards two cards. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ambition requires clarity. If you have any doubts, they must be abandoned." —Bontu, god of ambition

card.name: Undercity's Embrace
card.property: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Untamed Hunger
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mindlessness is not weakness. When we are lost to hunger we are unstoppable." —Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

card.name: Unyielding Krumar
card.property: {1} {W}: Unyielding Krumar gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The man whom I call father killed the orc who sired me, offering his world and his blade in return."

card.name: Urborg Uprising
card.property: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Urborg, few things are less permanent than death.

card.name: Vampire Champion
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These pirates must answer for their ancestors, who renounced the Church of Dusk and sailed from Torrezon as heretics."

card.name: Vampire Envoy
card.property: Flying Whenever Vampire Envoy becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Zendikar will fight until it has bled its last."

card.name: Vampire Hexmage
card.property: First strike Sacrifice Vampire Hexmage: Remove all counters from target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the blood hunt lost its thrill, she looked for less tangible means of domination.

card.name: Vampire Lacerator
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless an opponent has 10 or less life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lacerators cut themselves before each hunt. They must feed before the sun rises or bleed to death.

card.name: Vampire Nighthawk
card.property: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

card.name: Vessel of Malignity
card.property: {1} {B}, Sacrifice Vessel of Malignity: Target opponent exiles two cards from their hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From within its prison, the book endlessly whispers words of cruelty and spite.

card.name: Virulent Swipe
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Voracious Null
card.property: {1} {B}, Sacrifice another creature: Put two +1/+1 counters on Voracious Null. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These days, there's no shortage of food for the nulls of Guul Draz."—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

card.name: Vraska's Finisher
card.property: When Vraska's Finisher enters the battlefield, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You might have pleaded your case with my queen earlier. Now I am here, and it is far too late."

card.name: Wake of Vultures
card.property: Flying {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Wake of Vultures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So the vulture said to the griffin, 'You gonna eat that?'" —Azeworai, "The Ugly Bird"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Feeding a normal army is a problem of logistics. With zombies, it is an asset. Feeding is why they fight. Feeding is why they are feared."—Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

card.name: Walk the Plank
card.property: Destroy target non-Merfolk creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Captain Thorn adds a new ship to his fleet, he gives the crew a simple choice: follow me, or fall in the sea.

card.name: Wander in Death
card.property: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Forever restless. Forever growing in number.

card.name: Warteye Witch
card.property: Whenever Warteye Witch or another creature you control dies, scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eyeballs that portend unpleasant futures become slimy snacks instead.

card.name: Weight of the Underworld
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -3/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Proud Alkmenos, who would not bow to Erebos in death, is now bowed by his own hubris for all eternity.

card.name: Weirded Vampire
card.property: Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Emrakul makes apparent those whom she has favored."—Runo Stromkirk

card.name: Wight of Precinct Six
card.property: Wight of Precinct Six gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your opponents' graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the lost and undead need a protector.

card.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {B}: Regenerate Will-o'-the-Wisp. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On dark nights you can still see the light of the Vess girl's lantern out in the Caligo, seeking her lost brother. Those who follow are doomed to join her endless search." —"The Fall of the House of Vess"

card.name: Windgrace Acolyte
card.property: Flying When Windgrace Acolyte enters the battlefield, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Acolytes of the lost Lord Windgrace fight to keep Urborg relics out of Cabal hands.

card.name: Wrench Mind
card.property: Target player discards two cards unless they discard an artifact card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What is the sound of one head snapping?

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Belzenlok's lieutenant Yar-Kul grew too ambitious, the Demonlord transformed him into a maggot. The frog that ate the maggot grew and grew, until a ravenous spirit burst from its body.

card.name: Zulaport Chainmage
card.property: Cohort — {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: Target opponent loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The chains obey her. Everything else would do best to get out of her way.

card.name: Act of Treason
card.property: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Seen through Rakdos eyes, a cruel betrayal is a hilarious stunt.

card.name: Act on Impulse
card.property: Exile the top three cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way. (If you cast a spell this way, you still pay its costs. You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You don't want to know what happens after I put on the goggles."

card.name: Ahn-Crop Crasher
card.property: Haste You may exert Ahn-Crop Crasher as it attacks. When you do, target creature can't block this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hesitation breeds dissension. To be worthy of the next life, you must never look back." —Anep, vizier of Hazoret

card.name: Ainok Tracker
card.property: First strike Morph {4}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some ainok of the mountains are accepted among the Temur as trusted hunt-mates.

card.name: Akroan Sergeant
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

card.name: Alchemist's Greeting
card.property: Alchemist's Greeting deals 4 damage to target creature. Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Alesha, Who Smiles at Death
card.property: First strike Whenever Alesha, Who Smiles at Death attacks, you may pay {W/B}{W/B}. If you do, return target creature card with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

card.name: Ancient Grudge
card.property: Destroy target artifact. Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If there's anything a werewolf hates, it's a collar—especially Avacyn's Collar, the symbol of her church.

card.name: Anger
card.property: Haste As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Molten earth has no anger of its own. Only by infusing it with your own rage can the magma seethe and take shape." —Koth of the Hammer

card.name: Anger of the Gods
card.property: Anger of the Gods deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There was no reason to pray. This was already an act of the gods.

card.name: Arc Trail
card.property: Arc Trail deals 2 damage to any target and 1 damage to another target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't try to hit your enemies. Concentrate on the space between them, and fill the air with doom." —Spear-Tribe teaching

card.name: Arrow Storm
card.property: Arrow Storm deals 4 damage to any target. Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn, instead Arrow Storm deals 5 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First the thunder, then the rain.

card.name: Atarka Efreet
card.property: Megamorph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.) When Atarka Efreet is turned face up, it deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Avalanche Riders
card.property: Haste Echo {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Avalanche Riders enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

card.name: Avarax
card.property: Haste When Avarax enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Avarax, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library. {1}{R}: Avarax gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Azra Bladeseeker
card.property: When Azra Bladeseeker enters the battlefield, each player on your team may discard a card, then each player who discarded a card this way draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never get too attached to a weapon. You must allow a better one to find its way to you."

card.name: Balduvian Horde
card.property: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We earn no medals and fight for no titles. Blood is proof of our victory." —Lovisa Coldeyes

card.name: Barging Sergeant
card.property: Haste Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't stop till your horns come out their back."

card.name: Barrage of Boulders
card.property: Barrage of Boulders deals 1 damage to each creature you don't control. Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, creatures can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crude tactics can be effective nonetheless.

card.name: Battle Rampart
card.property: Defender {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will build no sanctuaries. The safety you seek can be won only by the sword." —Yannash, outpost builder

card.name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

card.name: Beetleback Chief
card.property: When Beetleback Chief enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether trained, ridden, or eaten, few goblin military innovations have rivaled the bug.

card.name: Bellows Lizard
card.property: {1} {R}: Bellows Lizard gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the price of wood and coal rose, smiths found creative ways to keep their forges burning.

card.name: Blades of Velis Vel
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Up to two target creatures each get +2/+0 and gain all creature types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The changing kind suffers as we do. We must join as one to quench our tyrants!"

card.name: Blastfire Bolt
card.property: Blastfire Bolt deals 5 damage to target creature. Destroy all Equipment attached to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Encase yourself in the most elaborate armor, and cower behind the heaviest shield. I would hate for you to feel helpless." —Korig the Ruiner

card.name: Blazing Volley
card.property: Blazing Volley deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The arrows fell like fiery rain, and for a moment, the sky itself seemed to burn.

card.name: Blindblast
card.property: Blindblast deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Peril is in the eye of the beholder. At least, if your aim is good."—Jaya Ballard

card.name: Bloodfire Expert
card.property: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some efreet abandon their homes in the volcanic Fire Rim to embrace the Jeskai Way and discipline their innate flames.

card.name: Bloodlust Inciter
card.property: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Bloodmad Vampire
card.property: Whenever Bloodmad Vampire deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Blood Ogre
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

card.name: Bloodstone Goblin
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell, if that spell was kicked, Bloodstone Goblin gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The stone whispers tales of darkness and fire. She replies, "Tell me more."

card.name: Blow Your House Down
card.property: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn. Destroy any of them that are Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You think these walls will protect you?My, you have a dim view of the power of the wilds"—Marawen, barrow witch

card.name: Blur of Blades
card.property: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Blur of Blades deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Samut battled her way through the hordes, shouting the names of those who'd died in her crop and those she hoped yet to save.

card.name: Boggart Brute
card.property: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has the biggest bashing stick, so it's a safe bet he's the leader.

card.name: Boiling Earth
card.property: Boiling Earth deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Awaken 4—{6}{R} (If you cast this spell for {6}{R}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

card.name: Bombard
card.property: Bombard deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Want to sink a ship? Blow a hole in the hull. Want to kill a regisaur? Same answer."—Captain Brandis Thorn

card.name: Bomber Corps
card.property: Battalion — Whenever Bomber Corps and at least two other creatures attack, Bomber Corps deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Borrowed Hostility
card.property: Escalate {3} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.) Choose one or both — • Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. • Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Boulder Salvo
card.property: Surge {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its surge cost if you or a teammate has cast another spell this turn.) Boulder Salvo deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If someone claims the sky is falling, I listen." —Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

card.name: Brazen Buccaneers
card.property: Haste When Brazen Buccaneers enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Brazen Wolves
card.property: Whenever Brazen Wolves attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With fewer patrols about, Kessig's roads have become prime hunting grounds.

card.name: Brimstone Dragon
card.property: Flying, haste

card.name: Brimstone Mage
card.property: Level up {3}{R} ({3}{R}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 2/3 {T}: Brimstone Mage deals 1 damage to any target. LEVEL 3+ 2/4 {T}: Brimstone Mage deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Bring Low
card.property: Bring Low deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature has a +1/+1 counter on it, Bring Low deals 5 damage to it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "People are often humbled by the elements. But the elements, too, can be humbled." —Surrak, khan of the Temur

card.name: Browbeat
card.property: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to them. If no one does, target player draws three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even the threat of power has power." —Jeska, warrior adept

card.name: Brute Strength
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not the size of the rock. It's how badly you want to lift it.

card.name: Built to Smash
card.property: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If it's an artifact creature, it gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Free from Consulate regulations, renegade-built automatons push performance to the limit.

card.name: Burst Lightning
card.property: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Burst Lightning deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage instead.

card.name: Canyon Lurkers
card.property: Morph {3}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The broken Qal Sisma foothills make poor terrain for cavalry, but a perfect setting for ambushes.

card.name: Cartouche of Zeal
card.property: Enchant creature you control When Cartouche of Zeal enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fifth cartouche is the final affirmation of glory, granted only to the worthy dead.

card.name: Cathartic Reunion
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard two cards. Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The chasm of years and worlds collapsed under the power of their embrace.

card.name: Chandra's Pyrohelix
card.property: Chandra's Pyrohelix deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now that I've dealt with your little toys, I can focus on the real problem: you."—Chandra Nalaar, to Dovin Baan

card.name: Chandra's Revolution
card.property: Chandra's Revolution deals 4 damage to target creature. Tap target land. That land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chandra was driven by her anger, directed particularly at the man who had taken her father from her.

card.name: Chaos Warp
card.property: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Charging Monstrosaur
card.property: Trample, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I knew I should have stayed with the boat. Always stay with the boat!"

card.name: Chartooth Cougar
card.property: {R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Cinder Hellion
card.property: Trample When Cinder Hellion enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chandra used jets of flame to lure hellions into the path of oncoming Eldrazi.

card.name: Cleansing Screech
card.property: Cleansing Screech deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Crackle" and "pop" are the most wondrous sounds.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ravnica's most ancient streets take on a life of their own. A few have decided to move to nicer neighborhoods.

card.name: Cosmotronic Wave
card.property: Cosmotronic Wave deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Creatures your opponents control can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This sort of innovation occurs when you set out to improve an electric tea kettle and misplace a decimal."

card.name: Cragganwick Cremator
card.property: When Cragganwick Cremator enters the battlefield, discard a card at random. If you discard a creature card this way, Cragganwick Cremator deals damage equal to that card's power to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each night that his bowl fills, a village mourns.

card.name: Crash Through
card.property: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Draw a card.

card.name: Crowd's Favor

property.name: Flavor

property.value: Pirate captains rarely enjoy a peaceful retirement.

property.value: Enthusiasm can be tempered in the furnace of the earth.

property.value: Architects find inspiration in the dragon's beauty of form, while artificers are influenced by the function of its fire.

card.property: Target creature can't block this turn. Draw a card.

property.value: "Intruders in the lands of Atarka have but two choices: be consumed by fire, or be consumed by maw." —Ulnok, Atarka shaman

property.value: "Zendikar is always angry, though I've never seen that anger so precisely directed."—Nablus, North Hada trapper

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins' eager curiosity leads them to scavenging, petty theft, and the rigging of sleek pirate ships. Some stop at scavenging.

property.name: Flavor

property.value: "It is not in me to tread lightly." —Ryda, geomancer

property.value: "Our lives, our homes, and all our history are at risk. Do not speak to me of peace."

card.name: Ainok Survivalist
card.property: Megamorph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.) When Ainok Survivalist is turned face up, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Temur welcome bears into the clan, fighting alongside them in battle. The relationship dates back to when they labored side by side under Sultai rule.

card.name: Ambassador Oak
card.property: When Ambassador Oak enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Treefolk and elves share a common interest in the forests, but really the elves just feel at home with the view from above.

card.name: Ana Sanctuary
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a blue or black permanent, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control a blue permanent and a black permanent, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Ancestral Mask
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each other enchantment on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I pass to you all we have ever been. Go forth and become all we never could."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is taller than all but the tallest trees, and older than all but the oldest.

card.name: Ancient Stirrings
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. (Cards with no colored mana in their mana costs are colorless. Lands are also colorless.)

card.name: Arachnus Web
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. At the beginning of the end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, destroy Arachnus Web.

card.name: Arbor Armament
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains reach until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Llanowar's boughs are ever ready To unleash an autumn of steel leaves."—"Song of Freyalise"

card.name: Arbor Elf
card.property: {T}: Untap target Forest.

card.name: Asceticism
card.property: Creatures you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.) {1}{G}: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let my ignominy build walls thicker than iron and stronger than darksteel." —Thrun, the last troll

card.name: Aura Gnarlid
card.property: Creatures with power less than Aura Gnarlid's power can't block it. Aura Gnarlid gets +1/+1 for each Aura on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kill a gnarlid with your first blow, or it'll cheerfully show you how it's done.

card.name: Avacyn's Pilgrim
card.property: {T}: Add {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn's protection is everywhere. From the holy church to the sacred glade, all that we see is under her blessed watch."

card.name: Backwoods Survivalists
card.property: Delirium — Backwoods Survivalists gets +1/+1 and has trample as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Paranoia has driven some Kessig communities to hunt down anything—and anyone—that travels through their woods.

card.name: Baloth Gorger
card.property: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) If Baloth Gorger was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A baloth only cares about the many things it eats and the few things that eat it.

card.name: Basking Rootwalla

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every little cub has its mother's teeth to guard it. —Elvish saying

card.name: Beastbreaker of Bala Ged
card.property: Level up {2}{G} ({2}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 4/4 LEVEL 4+ 6/6 Trample

card.name: Beastmaster Ascension
card.property: Whenever a creature you control attacks, you may put a quest counter on Beastmaster Ascension. As long as Beastmaster Ascension has seven or more quest counters on it, creatures you control get +5/+5.

card.name: Beast Within
card.property: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them." ―Euphemia, Nexus watcher

card.name: Become Immense
card.property: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Target creature gets +6/+6 until end of turn.

card.name: Beneath the Sands
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though buried and muffled, nature's whisper still called to Nissa.

card.name: Bestial Menace
card.property: Create a 1/1 green Snake creature token, a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, and a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My battle cry reaches ears far keener than yours." —Saidah, Joraga hunter

card.name: Birds of Paradise
card.property: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The gods used their feathers to paint all the colors of the world." —Yare-Tiva, warden of Gramur Forest

card.name: Bitterblade Warrior
card.property: You may exert Bitterblade Warrior as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The vizier of poisons teaches an unconventional kind of strength."

card.name: Bitterbow Sharpshooters
card.property: Vigilance, reach

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember, brother, the eyes are always vulnerable." "I never forgot."

card.name: Blanchwood Armor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Forest you control.

card.name: Blastoderm
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

card.name: Bloom Tender
card.property: {T}: For each color among permanents you control, add one mana of that color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beauty is a seed, waiting to blossom under her capable hands.

card.name: Blossom Dryad
card.property: {T}: Untap target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only force on Ixalan not interested in finding the golden city is Ixalan itself.

card.name: Borderland Explorer
card.property: When Borderland Explorer enters the battlefield, each player may discard a card. Each player who discarded a card this way may search their library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into their hand, then shuffle their library.

card.name: Borderland Ranger
card.property: When Borderland Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's only one route from Kessig into Stensia. Unless you come with me."

card.name: Bow of Nylea
card.property: Attacking creatures you control have deathtouch. {1}{G}, {T}: Choose one — • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. • Bow of Nylea deals 2 damage to target creature with flying. • You gain 3 life. • Put up to four target cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Briarhorn
card.property: Flash When Briarhorn enters the battlefield, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Evoke {1}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Bristling Boar
card.property: Bristling Boar can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nicol Bolas destroyed my world. I owe it to Skalla to celebrate all life, no matter how dangerous."—Vivien Reid

card.name: Broken Bond
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can't bear to see another plane broken before I make my own home whole. I'm sorry, but my watch is over."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The native creatures of Zendikar have adapted to live under rocks and crawl through underbrush in order to avoid the most voracious predators. The Eldrazi have yet to make such adjustments.

card.name: Byway Courier
card.property: When Byway Courier dies, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A good courier travels fast and asks no questions.

card.name: Call the Scions
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) Create two 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ulamog's progeny swarm the land, draining Zendikar's mana to feed the titan's insatiable hunger.

card.name: Canopy Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It keeps the upper reaches of the forest free of every menace . . . except for the spider itself.

card.name: Carnivorous Moss-Beast

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ranger wisdom dictates that when fleeing from a moss-beast, you must stay calm, find your bearings, and run south.

card.name: Carpet of Flowers
card.property: At the beginning of each of your main phases, if you haven't added mana with this ability this turn, you may add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of Islands target opponent controls.

card.name: Caustic Caterpillar
card.property: {1} {G}, Sacrifice Caustic Caterpillar: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The rare and beautiful butterflies inspire the design of our thopters. The larvae, however, are a different story entirely."—Kiran Nalaar, Ghirapur inventor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The centaurs are truly free. Never will they be tamed by temptation or controlled by fear. They live in total harmony, a feat not yet achieved by our kind."—Ramal, sage of Westgate

card.name: Centaur Glade

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Mirari called to the centaurs, and all who heard it were forever changed.

card.name: Charging Rhino
card.property: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The knights of Troinir Keep took the rhino as their emblem due to its intense focus when charging down a perceived threat—a trait they discovered on a hunting excursion.

card.name: Chatter of the Squirrel
card.property: Create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token. Flashback {1}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Citanul Woodreaders
card.property: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.) When Citanul Woodreaders enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They seek out living trees to glean age-old secrets from sap and wood.

card.name: Clip Wings
card.property: Each opponent sacrifices a creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is a grim duty to save the world from those created to protect it.

card.name: Colossal Dreadmaw
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you feel the ground quake, run. If you hear its bellow, flee. If you see its teeth, it's too late.

card.name: Combo Attack
card.property: Two target creatures your team controls each deal damage equal to their power to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Success at Valor's Reach requires not only individual skill but also the ability to merge that skill with a partner's.

card.name: Commune with Nature
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Commune with the Gods
card.property: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or enchantment card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in many years, Elspeth asked for help.

card.name: Conifer Strider
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Atarka's presence thaws the glaciers of Qal Sisma, forcing its elementals to migrate or adapt.

card.name: Courser of Kruphix
card.property: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play the top card of your library if it's a land card. Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Creeping Mold
card.property: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sanctions, mandates, regulations . . . These things mean nothing to the natural world.

card.name: Crop Rotation
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land. Search your library for a land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zendikar's elves have developed innovative methods to mitigate the effects of the Roil.

card.name: Crossroads Consecrator
card.property: {G}, {T}: Target attacking Human gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May the steel of your blade match the steel in your soul."

card.name: The Crowd Goes Wild
card.property: Assist (Another player can pay up to {X} of this spell's cost. You choose the value of X.) Support X. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures.) Each creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Crowned Ceratok
card.property: Trample Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best way to calm a rampaging ceratok is to wait until it dies of natural causes.

card.name: Crushing Canopy
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target creature with flying. • Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Dimir may look all they want. We never grow tired of swatting their bugs."—Heruj, Selesnya hierophant

card.name: Cultivate
card.property: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

card.name: Daggerback Basilisk
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its ventricles weep venom, and it consumes only poison.

card.name: Dawn's Reflection
card.property: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional two mana in any combination of colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only Sylvok magic could truly capture the perfection of a Mirrodin sunrise.

card.name: Death-Hood Cobra

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Size alone does not guarantee survival." —Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

card.name: Defense of the Heart
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, and put those cards onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Desert Twister
card.property: Destroy target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Massive, mindless, and imbued with one terrible purpose.

card.name: Destructor Dragon
card.property: Flying When Destructor Dragon dies, destroy target noncreature permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After countless attacks on the Salt Road where it passes through the frozen tundra, the Abzan began to refer to the area as Atarka territory rather than Temur lands.

card.name: Dissenter's Deliverance
card.property: Destroy target artifact. Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When all doubts have melted away, the worthy will meet the Hour of Eternity and earn a place at the God-Pharaoh's side." —The Accounting of Hours

card.name: Domesticated Hydra
Dragonscale Boon
card.property: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature and untap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When we were lost and weary, the ainok showed us how to survive. They have earned the right to call themselves Abzan, and to wear the Scale." —Anafenza, khan of the Abzan

card.name: Dragon-Scarred Bear
card.property: Formidable — {1}{G}: Regenerate Dragon-Scarred Bear. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bears are a delicacy for the Atarka. The few that remain are the toughest of their species.

card.name: Dungrove Elder
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Dungrove Elder's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the trees of the forest are his army, and every leaf his shield.

card.name: Durkwood Baloth
