card.name: Earthen Arms
card.property: Put two +1/+1 counters on target permanent. Awaken 4—{6}{G} (If you cast this spell for {6}{G}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

card.name: Eldritch Evolution
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less, where X is 2 plus the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Exile Eldritch Evolution.

card.name: Elemental Uprising
card.property: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It's still a land. It must be blocked this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My heart and Zendikar's beat as one. Together we will endure." —Nissa Revane

card.name: Elephant Guide
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. When enchanted creature dies, create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

card.name: Elves of Deep Shadow
card.property: {T}: Add {B}. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cast out of the Conclave generations ago, these elves found a home in the corrupted districts of the Golgari.

card.name: Elvish Fury
card.property: Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fail to respect the forest and you will fertilize it.

card.name: Elvish Visionary
card.property: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From a tiny sprout, the greatest trees grow and flourish. May the seeds of your mind be equally fruitful."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My tales of war are the stories most asked for around the fires at night, but they're the ones I care least to tell."

card.name: Ember Weaver
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) As long as you control a red permanent, Ember Weaver gets +1/+0 and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Each night, the sun unravels and blows away. Each day, the spiders set a new one in the sky." —Sunseeder myth

card.name: Epic Confrontation
card.property: Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No matter the timeline, some legends will endure.

card.name: Essence Warden
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The more our numbers grow, the more I gain hope that Volrath and his cursed stronghold will one day fall." —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Eternal Witness
card.property: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

card.name: Experiment One
card.property: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Remove two +1/+1 counters from Experiment One: Regenerate Experiment One.

card.name: Explore
card.property: You may play an additional land this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will never run out of new oceans to explore or new sea-dwellers to embrace as my own." —Kiora

card.name: Explosive Vegetation
card.property: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Torching Krosa would be pointless. It grows faster than it burns.

card.name: Ezuri's Archers
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Ezuri's Archers blocks a creature with flying, Ezuri's Archers gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eyes and arrows trained ever skyward.

card.name: Fade into Antiquity
card.property: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Are the gods angry at our discontent with what they give us, or jealous that we made a thing they cannot?" —Kleon the Iron-Booted

card.name: Farseek
card.property: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

card.name: Feed the Clan
card.property: You gain 5 life. Ferocious — You gain 10 life instead if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Temur believe three things only are needed in life: a hot fire, a full belly, and a strong companion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a stunning act of diplomacy, Yasova Dragonclaw ceded a portion of Temur lands to the Sultai. Her clan protested until they saw she had given the Sultai the breeding grounds of the krushoks. They hadn't realized she had a sense of humor.

card.name: Feral Prowler
card.property: When Feral Prowler dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once favored companions, many cats were left to fend for themselves.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Known for their glowing horn and stone-rattling roar, zheng are the fiercest predators in the forest. Few survived before Jiang Yanggu came.

card.name: Fertile Ground
card.property: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The true strength of nature is not the raging storm or the charging rhino, but the inexorable vitality of life.

card.name: Fierce Empath
card.property: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Fog
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else." —Lord Hilneth

card.name: Formless Nurturing
card.property: Manifest the top card of your library, then put a +1/+1 counter on it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

card.name: Frontier Mastodon
card.property: Ferocious — Frontier Mastodon enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each bronze disk on its harness is an offering from a young Temur hunter, a sign of respect to the spirits of the wild.

card.name: Gaea's Blessing
card.property: Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library. Draw a card. When Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Gaea's Protector
card.property: Gaea's Protector must be blocked if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fallen Phyrexians were transmuted into elementals by Gaea long ago, but Yavimaya's other inhabitants still regard them with unease.

card.name: Giant Growth
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The prohibition of unnecessary tossing of the citizenry by giants shall also extend to spontaneous giants." —Isperia's Edict, provision VII.789.2

card.name: Giant Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Broken Lands are littered with the remnants of civilizations long dead and infested by terrors very much alive.

card.name: Gift of Growth
card.property: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Gift of Paradise
card.property: Enchant land When Gift of Paradise enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

card.name: Glade Watcher
card.property: Defender Formidable — {G}: Glade Watcher can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

card.name: Gnarlid Pack
card.property: Multikicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Gnarlid Pack enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Grapple with the Past
card.property: Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard, then you may return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Emrakul does not grant wishes. Desires simply align to her will.

card.name: Grazing Gladehart

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't be fooled. If it were as docile as it looks, it would've died off long ago." —Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

card.name: Greater Basilisk
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bone, stone . . . both taste the same to a hungry basilisk.

card.name: Greater Sandwurm
card.property: Greater Sandwurm can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A sandwurm can lie in wait beneath the sands for years until the slightest tremor alerts it to the presence of prey.

card.name: Greenbelt Rampager

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Subtlety is not a necessary part of sabotage.

card.name: Greenwood Sentinel
card.property: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Within a mile of the woodland, you will feel her eyes upon you. Within its borders, you will feel her blade.

card.name: Groundswell
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Guardian Shield-Bearer

card.name: Hamlet Captain
card.property: Whenever Hamlet Captain attacks or blocks, other Humans you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bloodsuckers, howlers, monsters from the beyond . . . it doesn't much matter. I won't have to face them alone."

card.name: Hardy Veteran
card.property: As long as it's your turn, Hardy Veteran gets +0/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Sun Empire, the Immortal Sun is a symbol of national identity. When they reclaim it, the Empire will flourish once more.

card.name: Harmonize
card.property: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words lie. People lie. The land tells the truth."

card.name: Harrow
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land. Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No spot in nature is truly barren.

card.name: Hooded Brawler
card.property: You may exert Hooded Brawler as it attacks. When you do, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nagas wielding twin daggers excel at the fighting technique known as the Bite of Rhonas.

card.name: Hooting Mandrills
card.property: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Interlopers in Sultai territory usually end up as crocodile chow or baboon bait.

card.name: Hornet Nest
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Hornet Nest is dealt damage, create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with flying and deathtouch. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Hunter's Ambush
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by nongreen creatures this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First you lose your enemy's trail. Then you lose all sense of direction. Then you hear the growls . . .

card.name: Hunt the Weak
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death lizard approaching, cap'n!" —Brint Doobin, last words

card.name: Hurricane
card.property: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't envy the grandeur of drakes. Their impression of grace fades when the first gust sends them crashing into one another." —Molimo, maro-sorcerer

card.name: Imperious Perfect

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a culture of beauty, the most beautiful are worshipped as gods.

card.name: Invigorate

card.property: Whenever another green creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Skyknight gear? Well, I have drake-skin gauntlets, supple and fireproof. Or a ceratok chestplate that'll stop a crossbow bolt."

card.name: Jungle Delver
card.property: {3} {G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Jungle Delver.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no power too great to be used in the defense of our ancestral lands."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She is adept at navigating the stadium's ever-changing landscape.

card.name: Kavu Climber
card.property: When Kavu Climber enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kavu might be above you —Llanowar expression meaning "keep an open mind"

card.name: Kavu Primarch
card.property: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) If Kavu Primarch was kicked, it enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Khalni Heart Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Khalni Heart Expedition and sacrifice it: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Kin-Tree Warden
card.property: {2}: Regenerate Kin-Tree Warden. Morph {G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The amber of the tree and the blood of my veins are the same."

card.name: Kozilek's Predator

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's difficult to outwit something that doesn't speak, strategize, or even think.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Feed on food, you eventually rot. Feed on rot, you live forever.—Kraul saying

card.name: Kraul Warrior
card.property: {5} {G}: Kraul Warrior gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The insectile kraul lurk in the tunnels below street level. Many are loyal to the Golgari Swarm, but others follow their own esoteric caste system.

card.name: Krosan Druid

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Druids endure disaster as seeds endure winter. Now Krosa blooms once more."

card.name: Krosan Tusker

card.name: Larger Than Life
card.property: Target creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They say Head Judge Tezzeret will be reviewing every invention at the Fair. I made sure to build something that will stand out." —Jehvani, Vahadar artificer

card.name: Lay of the Land
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Victory favors neither the righteous nor the wicked. It favors the prepared.

card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land is not dead, merely sick. I will nurse it back to health."

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Llanowar Elves
card.property: {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As patient and generous as life, as harsh and merciless as nature.

card.property: When Llanowar Empath enters the battlefield, scry 2, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it into your hand. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rely too much on your weapons and watch your dreams shatter in your hands." —Rhonas, god of strength

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Zendikar will not surrender, and neither can we."

card.property: Stalking Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the Jamuraan jungles, there is often no separating beauty from danger.

card.name: Stoic Builder
card.property: When Stoic Builder enters the battlefield, you may return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some have returned to Hollowhenge, the ruins of Avabruck, to restore the lost capital of Kessig.

card.name: Strength in Numbers
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hermit dies. The outcast dies. The lone wolf dies. Only those who stick together survive this world." —Uros, Pendelhaven elder

card.name: Sylvan Bounty
card.property: Target player gains 8 life. Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Sylvan Scrying
card.property: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As long as there is a single shred of life, there is hope."—Nissa Revane

card.name: Tajuru Pathwarden
card.property: Vigilance, trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My people blazed these pathways long ago, before the Eldrazi came. We will ride them long after the Eldrazi are gone."

card.name: Tajuru Warcaller
card.property: Rally — Whenever Tajuru Warcaller or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her rallying cry reaches far beyond the Tajuru elves, inspiring all those who hear it.

card.name: Take Down
card.property: Choose one — • Take Down deals 4 damage to target creature with flying. • Take Down deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The drake flew true. The arrow flew truer.

card.name: Talons of Wildwood
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) {2}{G}: Return Talons of Wildwood from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Tempt with Discovery
card.property: Tempting offer — Search your library for a land card and put it onto the battlefield. Each opponent may search their library for a land card and put it onto the battlefield. For each opponent who searches a library this way, search your library for a land card and put it onto the battlefield. Then each player who searched a library this way shuffles it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You tread upon the land all the time, yet you seem dismayed when it moves to step on you." —Nissa Revane

card.name: Territorial Baloth
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Territorial Baloth gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its territory is defined by wherever it is at the moment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Halana grew brambles to create a barricade around our camp, hoping that it would keep the wolves out. That was a mistake for which we almost paid dearly."—Alena, trapper of Kessig

card.name: Thornscape Battlemage
card.property: Kicker {R} and/or {W} (You may pay an additional {R} and/or {W} as you cast this spell.) When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {R} kicker, it deals 2 damage to any target. When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {W} kicker, destroy target artifact.

card.name: Thornweald Archer
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their arrows are tipped with basilisk eyes and fletched with cockatrice feathers.

card.name: Thrashing Brontodon
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice Thrashing Brontodon: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It cares more about preserving the herd's territory than about preserving itself.

card.name: Thrive
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of X target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most successful of Simic creations is cytoplasm, a living, symbiotic substance that feeds off genetic rhythms and strengthens its host in return.

card.name: Thrun, the Last Troll
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) {1}{G}: Regenerate Thrun, the Last Troll.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His crime was silence, and now he suffers it eternally.

card.name: Timberwatch Elf
card.property: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you ever want to leave this forest, now's the time."

card.name: Time to Feed
card.property: Choose target creature an opponent controls. When that creature dies this turn, you gain 3 life. Target creature you control fights that creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Tireless Tracker
card.property: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, put a +1/+1 counter on Tireless Tracker.

card.name: Titanic Growth
card.property: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The massive dominate through might. The tiny survive with guile. Beware the tiny who become massive.

card.name: Triumph of the Hordes
card.property: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample and infect. (Creatures with infect deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

card.name: Tukatongue Thallid
card.property: When Tukatongue Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jund's thallids tried to disguise their deliciousness by covering themselves in spines harvested from the tukatongue tree.

card.name: Turntimber Basilisk
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target creature block Turntimber Basilisk this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A long and difficult incision revealed that all vital organs are housed in the head, save for a long chain of stomachs, forty in all, leading from its throat to the end of the tail."—Mulak Ffar, Vastwood Biodiversity

card.name: Venom Sliver
card.property: Sliver creatures you control have deathtouch. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We attacked with arrows dipped in poison. The slivers that did not die began to change." —Hastric, Thunian scout

card.name: Vigor
card.property: Trample If damage would be dealt to another creature you control, prevent that damage. Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way. When Vigor is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: Watcher in the Web
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Watcher in the Web can block an additional seven creatures each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lost in the woods" is an optimistic way to describe a villager's disappearance. "Found in the woods" is frequently more appropriate.

card.name: Wellwisher
card.property: {T}: You gain 1 life for each Elf on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Close your ears to the voice of greed, and you can turn a gift for one into a gift for many."

card.name: Wild Growth
card.property: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you stop to listen, you can hear it grow.

card.name: Wild Mongrel
card.property: Discard a card: Wild Mongrel gets +1/+1 and becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It teaches you to play dead.

card.name: Wild Nacatl
card.property: Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain. Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Cloud Nacatl sit and think, a bunch of soft paws. We are the Claws of Marisi, stalking, pouncing, drawing blood."

card.name: Wildsize
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Two times the size, four times the smell.

card.name: Wolfkin Bond
card.property: Enchant creature When Wolfkin Bond enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

card.name: Woodborn Behemoth
card.property: As long as you control eight or more lands, Woodborn Behemoth gets +4/+4 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It carries the hopes of Zendikar's embattled wilds on its mighty boughs.

card.name: Woolly Loxodon
card.property: Morph {5}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even among the hardiest warriors of the Temur, loxodons are respected for their adaptation to the mountain snows.

card.name: Wren's Run Vanquisher
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal an Elf card from your hand or pay {3}. Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Yavimaya Elder
card.property: When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library. {2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.

card.name: Yavimaya Sapherd
card.property: When Yavimaya Sapherd enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When their community grows cluttered, thallids begin a traditional bobbing dance, then trek out in all directions." — Sarpadian Empires, vol. III

card.name: Yeva's Forcemage
card.property: When Yeva's Forcemage enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature can't be stopped. It rips and tears at Ravnica's tallest buildings to claim its place in the sun."

card.name: Zendikar's Roil
card.property: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 green Elemental creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was wrong. Zendikar isn't after me. It isn't after any of us. It's not evil or vengeful. It's magnificent . . . but it's in pain."—Nissa Revane

card.name: Abzan Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Exile target creature with power 3 or greater. • You draw two cards and you lose 2 life. • Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.

card.name: Abzan Guide
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) Morph {2}{W}{B}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These roads are desolate and changeable. Follow me, or die in the wastes."

card.name: Agony Warp
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Target creature gets -0/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life's circle has become inverted in Grixis. The same energy is endlessly recycled and becomes more stagnant with each pass.

card.name: Akroan Hoplite
card.property: Whenever Akroan Hoplite attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fair fight? How could it be a fair fight? We're Akroans. They're not."

card.name: Animar, Soul of Elements
card.property: Protection from white and from black Whenever you cast a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Animar, Soul of Elements. Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each +1/+1 counter on Animar.

card.name: Armadillo Cloak
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

card.name: Armament Corps
card.property: When Armament Corps enters the battlefield, distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Abzan avoid extended supply lines by incorporating weapons stores into their battle formations.

card.name: Assemble the Legion
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a muster counter on Assemble the Legion. Then create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste for each muster counter on Assemble the Legion.

card.name: Athreos, God of Passage
card.property: Indestructible As long as your devotion to white and black is less than seven, Athreos isn't a creature. Whenever another creature you own dies, return it to your hand unless target opponent pays 3 life.

card.name: Aura Shards
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gaea forged her soldiers into self-wielding weapons that struck down all impurities.

card.name: Azorius Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn. • Draw a card. • Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Azra Oddsmaker
card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, choose a creature. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player this turn, you draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I never give odds on my own fights. Unless, of course, you want to bet against me . . ."

card.name: Baleful Strix
card.property: Flying, deathtouch When Baleful Strix enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its beak rends flesh and bone, exposing the tender marrow of dream.

card.name: Baloth Null
card.property: When Baloth Null enters the battlefield, return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Humans use pigs to hunt for mushrooms, don't they? It's like that." —Harak, Malakir bloodwitch

card.name: Bear's Companion
card.property: When Bear's Companion enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 green Bear creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Sultai came hunting for a bear hide. Now I have a belt of naga skin, and my friend has a full belly."

card.name: Belligerent Brontodon
card.property: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Predators try to separate the young, old, or injured from the rest of the herd. The alternative is crushing defeat.

card.name: Bituminous Blast
card.property: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.) Bituminous Blast deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Bladewing the Risen
card.property: Flying When Bladewing the Risen enters the battlefield, you may return target Dragon permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield. {B}{R}: Dragon creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Blightning
card.property: Blightning deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While the smell of burning flesh is common in Grixis, the odor of smoldering brain matter is a rare treat.

card.name: Bloodbraid Elf
card.property: Haste Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

card.name: Boros Challenger
card.property: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) {2}{R}{W}: Boros Challenger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Send your champion. I could use a light workout."

card.name: Bounding Krasis
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Bounding Krasis enters the battlefield, you may tap or untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unpredictable as a storm and destructive as a tidal wave.

card.name: Call of the Nightwing
card.property: Create a 1/1 blue and black Horror creature token with flying. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Campaign of Vengeance
card.property: Whenever a creature you control attacks, defending player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no saving this world, not anymore. But we shall be its bloody vengeance."—Sorin Markov

card.name: Cauldron Dance
card.property: Cast this spell only during combat. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step. You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Citadel Castellan
card.property: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Renown 2 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the first line of defense. You will not encounter the second."

card.name: Coiling Oracle
card.property: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.

card.name: Contraband Kingpin
card.property: Lifelink Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't waste my time with trifles. Bring me works of art, and I will make you rich."

card.name: Corpsejack Menace
card.property: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, twice that many +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Weakness is not in the nature of the Swarm.

card.name: Crosis's Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Return target permanent to its owner's hand. • Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. • Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Cunning Breezedancer
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Cunning Breezedancer gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That which is beautiful in form can also be deadly." —Ishai, Ojutai dragonspeaker

card.name: Deathreap Ritual
card.property: Morbid — At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All who set foot in Paliano are pawns in someone's play for power."—Marchesa, the Black Rose

card.name: Deny Reality
card.property: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.) Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Draconic Disciple
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Draconic Disciple: Create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I am to die, I will die in the embrace of an immeasurable flame."

card.name: Dragon Broodmother
card.property: Flying At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 red and green Dragon creature token with flying and devour 2. (As the token enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. It enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)

card.name: Dragonlord Ojutai
card.property: Flying Dragonlord Ojutai has hexproof as long as it's untapped. Whenever Dragonlord Ojutai deals combat damage to a player, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Drana's Emissary
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The taste of freedom is sweeter than blood."

card.name: Engineered Might
card.property: Choose one — • Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn. • Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Esper Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target enchantment. • Draw two cards. • Target player discards two cards.

card.name: Ethercaste Knight
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We coat ourselves in steel every day. What is etherium but the next logical step?"

card.name: Ethereal Ambush
card.property: Manifest the top two cards of your library. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The energies of the Temur lands are readily unleashed upon intruders.

card.name: Extract from Darkness
card.property: Each player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard. Then you put a creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you want to wreak havoc above, sometimes it's best to look below.

card.name: Fires of Yavimaya
card.property: Creatures you control have haste. Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Flame-Kin Zealot
card.property: When Flame-Kin Zealot enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Boros soldiers are like a cache of bombs ready to explode, and the flame-kin light their fuses.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the shards merged into the Maelstrom, their mana energies fused into new monstrosities.

card.name: Gelectrode
card.property: {T}: Gelectrode deals 1 damage to any target. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may untap Gelectrode.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Diametrically opposing energies in self-sealed plasmodermic bubbles make great pets!"—Trivaz, Izzet mage

card.name: Ghor-Clan Rampager
card.property: Trample Bloodrush — {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?" —Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

card.name: The Gitrog Monster
card.property: Deathtouch At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice The Gitrog Monster unless you sacrifice a land. You may play an additional land on each of your turns. Whenever one or more land cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere, draw a card.

card.name: Goblin Deathraiders
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every once in a while, when they aren't getting incinerated in lava, crushed under rock slides, or devoured by dragons, goblins experience moments of unmitigated glory in battle.

card.name: Grim Contest
card.property: Choose target creature you control and target creature an opponent controls. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its toughness to the other.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The invader hoped he could survive the beast's jaws and emerge through its rotting skin.

card.name: Guided Passage
card.property: Reveal the cards in your library. An opponent chooses from among them a creature card, a land card, and a noncreature, nonland card. You put the chosen cards into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Hammer Dropper
card.property: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Giants know a solid hit is one part strength, four parts leverage.

card.name: Hidden Stockpile
card.property: Revolt — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1.

card.name: Highspire Mantis
card.property: Flying, trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wings produce a high-pitched, barely audible whirring sound in flight. Only Jeskai masters are quiet enough to hear one coming.

card.name: Hypothesizzle
card.property: Draw two cards. Then you may discard a nonland card. When you do, Hypothesizzle deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's like blowing up an arcane library in a thermobaric explosion. But in a good way."—Bori Andon, Izzet blastseeker

card.name: Iroas's Champion
card.property: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Accustomed to battling before an audience in the arena, Iroas's champions know how to put on a good show.

card.name: Join Shields
card.property: Untap all creatures you control. They gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are the shield that never breaks, the bough that never burns, the song that can never be silenced."

card.name: Jungle Barrier
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Jungle Barrier enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Within silent clearings guarded by living palisades, the natural world guards its most precious secrets.

card.name: Kathari Remnant
card.property: Flying {B}: Regenerate Kathari Remnant. Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

card.name: Kin-Tree Invocation
card.property: Create an X/X black and green Spirit Warrior creature token, where X is the greatest toughness among creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The passing years add new rings to the tree's trunk, bolstering the spirits that dwell within.

card.name: Kiora's Follower
card.property: {T}: Untap another target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "She may call herself Kiora but I believe she is Thassa, the embodiment of the sea and empress of the depths."

card.name: Kiss of the Amesha
card.property: Target player gains 7 life and draws two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a year, Akrasa holds a joust that draws knights and their leotaus from every nation on Bant. The prize is an Akrasan sigil, but the true reward is the angel's kiss.

card.name: Kolaghan's Command
card.property: Choose two — • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Target player discards a card. • Destroy target artifact. • Kolaghan's Command deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Kruphix, God of Horizons
card.property: Indestructible As long as your devotion to green and blue is less than seven, Kruphix isn't a creature. You have no maximum hand size. If you would lose unspent mana, that mana becomes colorless instead.

card.name: Lawmage's Binding
card.property: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

card.name: Lightning Helix
card.property: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though less well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boros Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.

card.name: Maelstrom Archangel

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Flying Whenever Maelstrom Archangel deals combat damage to a player, you may cast a nonland card from your hand without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no world where angels fear to tread.

card.name: Mardu Roughrider
card.property: Whenever Mardu Roughrider attacks, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor

property.value: Instead of creating a tool that would be damaged by heat, the Thran built one that was charged by it.

card.name: Cauldron of Souls
card.property: {T}: Choose any number of target creatures. Each of those creatures gains persist until end of turn. (When it dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Chromatic Lantern
card.property: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color." {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By guild tradition, any puddle of multicolored light on the cobblestones can serve as neutral ground.

card.name: Chromatic Star
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Star: Add one mana of any color. When Chromatic Star is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This item is not from . . . now. It reflects a sky no longer ours and gleams with hope that does not exist." —Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

card.name: Coat of Arms
card.property: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A banner for bonds of blood or belief.

card.name: Coldsteel Heart
card.property: Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield tapped. As Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Phyrexian death machine awoke, its coldsteel heart imbuing it with sinister new power.

card.name: Consulate Dreadnought
card.property: Crew 6 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 6 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's like they planted another Bastion right in the middle of the harbor." —Bes Tavani, Bomat merchant

card.name: Contagion Clasp
card.property: When Contagion Clasp enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. {4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Copper Carapace
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and can't block. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We will fight as they do: our flesh protected behind metal." —Tae Aquil, Viridian weaponsmith

card.name: Coveted Jewel
card.property: When Coveted Jewel enters the battlefield, draw three cards. {T}: Add three mana of any one color. Whenever one or more creatures an opponent controls attack you and aren't blocked, that player draws three cards and gains control of Coveted Jewel. Untap it.

card.name: Crenellated Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {T}: Target creature gets +0/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mercadian soldiers excel at finding things to stand behind.

card.name: Crystal Ball
card.property: {1}, {T}: Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It glints with arcane truths to those who know how to glimpse them.

card.name: Crystal Chimes
card.property: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Crystal Chimes: Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Serra was to learn, the peace and sanctity of her realm were as fragile as glass.

card.name: Crystal Shard
card.property: {3}, {T} or {U}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken know it is not of this world, so they know that this world is not the only one.

card.name: Darksteel Garrison
card.property: Fortified land has indestructible. Whenever fortified land becomes tapped, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Fortify {3} ({3}: Attach to target land you control. Fortify only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the land leaves.)

card.name: Diamond Mare
card.property: As Diamond Mare enters the battlefield, choose a color. Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen color, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Dolmen Gate
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to attacking creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lorwyn's stones resonate with the place from which they were hewed. Though taken far, still they call to their home when silence is upon the land.

card.name: Draco
card.property: Domain — This spell costs {2} less to cast for each basic land type among lands you control. Flying Domain — At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Draco unless you pay {10}. This cost is reduced by {2} for each basic land type among lands you control.

card.name: Dragon Mask
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With no further options, I was forced to don the mask." —Rashida Scalebane

card.name: Eater of Days
card.property: Flying, trample When Eater of Days enters the battlefield, you skip your next two turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Mirrodin's varied civilizations developed ways to fight the levelers, Memnarch upped the stakes.

card.name: Eldrazi Monument
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have flying and indestructible. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. If you can't, sacrifice Eldrazi Monument.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gods don't die. They merely slumber." —Ayli, Kamsa cleric

card.name: Elixir of Immortality
card.property: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bottled life. Not as tasty as I'm used to, rather stale, but it has the same effect." —Baron Sengir

card.name: Emmessi Tome
card.property: {5}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is like life and destiny: we think we know the story, but we have read only half the tale.

card.name: Etched Oracle

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it finishes the harvest, you'll have nowhere to hide.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's the must-have gift for everyone on your list. Get one for yourself, too!"—Chammi, curio vendor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who drink from Malfegor's cup are tainted with hunger and stained with lies.

card.name: Foundry Inspector
card.property: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.value: Automaton inspectors ensure that the Consulate's stringent standards for mass production are upheld.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Entrepreneurs have attempted to sell the water, but to no avail. Whatever magic it contains disappears upon bottling.

card.name: Frogmite

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At first, vedalken observers thought blinkmoths naturally avoided certain places. Then they realized those places were frogmite feeding grounds.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

card.name: Guardians of Meletis
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The histories speak of two feuding rulers whose deaths were celebrated and whose monuments symbolized the end of their wars. In truth they were peaceful lovers, their story lost to the ages.

card.name: Heavy Arbalest
Helm of Awakening
card.property: Spells cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This little prize will cover your head, your spells, your bets, and your behind!" —Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Use everything. Iron, rust, scrap . . . even the ground must join our cause." —Ezuri, renegade leader

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor

card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hard to imagine," mused Hanna, stroking the petal, "such a lovely flower inspiring such greed."

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Kaya, Ghost Haunter
card.property: 0: Exile Kaya, Ghost Haunter haunting target creature for as long as that creature remains on the battlefield. −1: You get an emblem with, "At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 3 damage to the owner of target haunted creature." −2: You get an emblem with, "At the beginning of your upkeep, gain control of target haunted creature for as long as it remains haunted."

card.name: Louvaq, the Aberrant
card.property: Protection from modified creatures (Modified creatures have a power, toughness, or ability different than their printed versions.) At the beginning of each player's end step, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature that player controls.

card.name: Personal Decoy
card.property: Personal Decoy enters the battlefield with a number of loyalty counters on it equal to your life total. If it would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else. You can't be attacked. +1: You gain 1 life. −4: Draw a card.

card.name: Pick Your Poison
card.property: Choose any number of modes that total exactly 4. You may choose the same mode more than once. [1] Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. [2] Create a 1/1 black Snake creature token with deathtouch. [4] All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Seek Bolas's Counsel
card.property: Choose one at random— • You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, pay {U}{B}{R}. If you don't, you lose the game." • Each player discards their hand. • Planeswalk to Pools of Becoming. (Once there you can roll the planar die only if you're playing Planechase.) • For each opponent, exile cards from the top of their library until you exile a nonland card. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs. • Destroy all creatures and non-Bolas planeswalkers. • You get an emblem with "You can cast nonland cards from your sideboard."
